Negative_Review: We discovered the wash basin was partially blocked so we reported this the following morning We assumed this was dealt with after we left The tea at breakfast was not very good It didn t appear to have been freshly made which is a requirement for a good brew I m nit picking now
Positive_Review: The welcome we received by Mint I think that was her name was warm and made us feel special We arrived two hours early but our room was ready and it looked clean and a good size for a standard room It was very quiet and had all we required for the one night stay The bar staff and those serving at breakfast were also very friendly and helpful There was a good choice of food and drink for breakfast

Negative_Review: We were upgraded to Club but the there was not enough room in the Club lounge at breakfast and it felt a bit claustrophobic
Positive_Review: Loved the location Near to shops transport links Hyde Park and The Albert Hall Views of London from our room on Club floor were excellent

Negative_Review: Didn t quite get the lighting Could have done with a smaller individual light for insomniac who didn t want to disturb her companion
Positive_Review: Such comfortable beds

Negative_Review: The bed was very small and the air conditioning unit in the room was huge noisy and didn t really cool the room down They wanted an extra 50 per night to upgrade to a deluxe room which was never worth it The foyer was small and always crowded The rooms let this hotel down need bigger beds and refreshing
Positive_Review: The location was good it was quiet at night and the bar had a nice ambiance about it

Negative_Review: The booking was incorrect there was no breakfast on the computer The catering was not goog with cold tea serviced on 2 occasions and no plates to put your breakfast on
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bedroom bathroom lighting was too complicated with too many switches and a delay with lights Pillows should be replaced
Positive_Review: Staff were very efficient and helpful

Negative_Review: The breakfast was not as impressive as might be expected for the price with the exception of some oriental dishes it was pretty much same old same old and the spelling errors too jarring for my expectations
Positive_Review: The Front Desk staff were very helpful extra star for Poonam and the room was roomy comfortable

Negative_Review: The location was not as close to the Royal Albert Hall as suggested in the description of the Hotel It said within walking distance but it was a GOOD walk at least a mile A fter a concert there one evening we got a taxi back to the hotel
Positive_Review: The staff were very attentive and went out of their way to be helpful Nothing was any trouble

Negative_Review: The only thing that caused confusion was Wi Fi and will probably end up paying vast sum Slight tube noise as we were on that side of the hotel
Positive_Review: Club room excellent and great club lounge breakfast

Negative_Review: On arrival we were charged 15 each for Breakfast despite breakfast costing 12 This was refunded after I was able to prove that we had pre paid for breakfast when we booked Breakfast was poor Hot food was only luke warm A fresh batch of fried eggs from the kitchen were cold The superior room 970 was shabby The smoke alarm was covered which is a safety issue I reported this to reception but no action was taken
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Smell of sewage outside bathroom flush system broke down but to give management credit it was repaired quickly at midnight worn apprearance of rooms 3pm access to room when traveling long distance by train
Positive_Review: ease of access to the albert hall local restaurants and shops LOCATION

Negative_Review: The food offered in the evening was poor We ate there twice but on our second time there we found better options even though we had to walk a long way it was still the better choice The room we had on the 2 occasions we were there we very rundown but compared to other properties we had stayed at it seemed comaprable
Positive_Review: Breakfast and help of concierge and it was nice to have a bath to soak in

Negative_Review: Breakfast was disappointing So many people that the standard of cooked food was not good
Positive_Review: Brilliant location Excellent car park and easy to find We upgraded to a superior double which came with breakfast drinks voucher and free bottled water Large room with comfy bed and a very quiet floor

Negative_Review: Room was hot and stuffy windows had been sealed up and the huge air con that ran under the whole width of the room even on its lowest setting did very little We had a problem with the TV not working and it took over an hour for the engineer to come so when we got in at 10 30pm and the room was still hot we did not want to wait again for the engineer At check out we told reception who said you should have called maintainance Rooms are ready for a refub
Positive_Review: well situated hotel for the Albert Hall where we went to a concert

Negative_Review: Breakfast not great Really noisy air con units in bedroom
Positive_Review: Good location close to the Royal Albert Hall Excellent value for money compared to most other hotels in the area Got a free upgrade to the executive club upon arrival

Negative_Review: Upgraded on arrival for a small fee to a superior room Great views but the room was very dated and tired In desperate need of refurbishment
Positive_Review: View from room and the central location

Negative_Review: Laundry facilities was not working because it was Easter weekend Was given a disabled room when that wasn t what I paid for The shower plug didn t work and I flooded the bathroom the maintenance said they would fix it but never came back No shower for a weekend is not good enough I stayed in a nice hotel to escape the hostels I ve been staying in for just a weekend but honestly the hostels were better Was not impressed at all and regret spending so much money staying here
Positive_Review: It was a bed to sleep in

Negative_Review: My partner complained her breakfast was not warm Bathroom was a little tired and cosy As all London hotels are it was a little expensive compared to elsewhere in the country
Positive_Review: Good location nice room It was ideal for the Albert Hall we went to a concert Good selection for breakfast

Negative_Review: I did not sleep at all due to the constant noise though the night emanating from the air conditioning unit in the roim The short curtain was broken and dirty
Positive_Review: The meal I had in the restaurant was excellent however the bar snack was just about ample

Negative_Review: Booking in process poor and we had someone else trying to get into our room due to an error by reception
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good and the room was clean and comfy

Negative_Review: Everything seemed a bit tired needed a bit of freshening up Room wasn t soundproof could here the tubes travelling outside from early morning
Positive_Review: Value for money London is a big city but it suited us geographically The rooms were clean but becoming tired as was the whole hotel Overall it worked well for our trip and it wouldn t bother me to stay there again but I wouldn t go out of my way to specifically book this hotel Breakfast was good hot and plenty of it

Negative_Review: The room was at the rear of the building and looked onto the rail line which was a little noisy but I have to say did not stop us sleeping
Positive_Review: Comfortable room with lovely shower toiletries etc and very handy for the tube station Staff were very helpful and we were very happy with our choice of hotel

Negative_Review: Mix up with the check in would have preferred a choice of where to sit at breakfast
Positive_Review: Staff friendly nice ambience walking distance to the Albert Hall

Negative_Review: furnishings a bit dated hair dryer absurdly placed over work desk bathroom countertop cramped and mirror too far from sink Due to a bad knee i requested well in advance a room near the elevator but this was ignored
Positive_Review: Excellent breakfast friendly staff good choice of on site restaurants well appointed room very comfortable bed

Negative_Review: Very noisy room with the rail track outside with trains going very late into the night and very early in the morning needs better noise insulation
Positive_Review: ideal for out night out at the Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: We were upgraded to a Superior Double room however it was a twin room and the divan part of the beds were rather tatty Very basic for a Superior room
Positive_Review: The mattress was very comfy had a good night s sleep with limited noise tea coffee iron and ironing board in the room adequate bathroom accessories full English breakfast relaxed atmosphere fabulous location

Negative_Review: Very slight noise from circle line trains but not obtrusive
Positive_Review: Clean room with comfy beds and excellent breakfast Great location for visit to Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: Expensive for a run of the mill hotel Bedroom albeit v clean was shabby and tired Air Con old and noisy The whole place needs refurb
Positive_Review: Location is good v accessible to everywhere The breakfast was good and the Staff very nice and helpful It is Clean and the Beds were comfortable

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Welcomed by the concierge and taken to check in where our room was kindly upgraded which was a lovely surprise Great location for the Royal Albert Hall we got a taxi there but in short supply after the show as the hotel is only a 15 20 minute walk away we were able to stroll back

Negative_Review: we were given a room on arrival but someone was already in the room pilot complained at reception and was given an upgrade to the club room which included breakfast but we had already paid for breakfast so not much of an upgrade Would be nice to be given breakfast included in our next visit in September
Positive_Review: convenient to the Royal albert hall

Negative_Review: Rooms dated Power outlets did not work Loud refrigerator Situated next to train line which made room noisy Toilet would not flush Wires hanging out of wall socket Talked into an upgrade which was a total waste of money
Positive_Review: Not much except the location

Negative_Review: We paid for an upgrade to a club room The room was OK but the Club lounge which we had our breakfast in was too small for the number of people who were allowed to use it It was chaos and the staff did not explain that you could order extras for the breakfast The evening drinks were served with a weird combination of onion rings and fish fingers which seemed a bit strange
Positive_Review: A good hotel and location Had a club room which had everything in it

Negative_Review: Our room was very hot and the air conditioning didn t cool it down The bath was stained and the shower curtain was covered in mildew
Positive_Review: The initial look of the hotel was very pleasing the foyer was beautiful and staff friendly

Negative_Review: Kept awake by the train line that was right below the room if ever staying in this hotel ask for a room with an even number then you will be placed at front of hotel not rear
Positive_Review: The hotel was convenient and no too far from city centre

Negative_Review: I booked a double room and a request for it to be on the west side away from the underground station This was confirmed by Copthorne Tara On check in I was allocated a twin bed room just a few floors above the station This was rectified but took about one hour
Positive_Review: I am a frequent guests and always like the friendliness of the staff

Negative_Review: The restaurant bar staff were not very organised or friendly
Positive_Review: We were surprised to find out we were Guest of the Day and upgraded the reception team were really friendly and helpful The rooms were tidy clean and had a great view of the city

Negative_Review: Disappointing meal in the Asian restaurant poor value for money
Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff great location excellent breakfast Very convenient for the Royal Albert Hall and nearby attractions

Negative_Review: Rooms are now v tired and need a refurb Bathroom especially Rooms at back odd nos suffer from railway noise Zask for an even number
Positive_Review: Stayed here several times before and rRestaurant food much improved Staff v helpful

Negative_Review: Keep up the good work
Positive_Review: We booked the copthorne Tara hotel as we were attending a jolly merse concert the royal Albert hall so this was the perfect location for us the hotel is great for access anywhere in around london The staff were very pleasant friendly happy to help The superior room we had was very comfortable even had air conditioning we paid a bit extra for breakfast but my word you would not be disappointed as the choice was quite unbelievable From continental english pancakes Chinese if you wanted breads toast juices as much tea coffee as you wanted The bar is open till late the bar staff are brilliant really know how to pour the perfect pint of Guinness so if you are looking for somewhere to stay when in london I can strongly recommend the copthorne Tara hotel

Negative_Review: Tea served at breakfast out of thermos jug did not have a very pleasant taste and was not very hot Only stayed one night so room was comfortable my only comment would be that the bathroom shower needed upgrading
Positive_Review: Location Had a good deal so very good value for money for London Hotels and theatre break Good choice for breakfast and staff very friendly

Negative_Review: Rooms bathrooms are a little dated but perfectly adequate and clean
Positive_Review: Great location good facilities close to local bars and restaurants in Kensington High Street

Negative_Review: Small criticism was that I thought the complementary breakfast was a bit dry as it is buffet and had been out a while However would stay here again
Positive_Review: Staff were great Room was lovely but then we were lucky enough to receive a guest of the day upgrade Did not have time to check out all the facilities or the complementary drinks as we had reservations at the Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The bed was comfy rooms very clean and spacey bathrooms clean Food was great and value for money The staff was so very friendly and helpful Will stay here again

Negative_Review: Room was a bit tired and I had to move beds to avoid a switch box directly above the pillow which caused discomfort where it was Sink drained only slowly and a number of repairs had been carried left decor looking shabby The room was actually an upgrade
Positive_Review: Breakfast

Negative_Review: Our breakfast table was very close to those either side of us making it difficult to get to the buffet A little more space would have been appreciated
Positive_Review: The helpfulness of every staff member to whom we spoke the comfortable room and the cleanliness of the hotel

Negative_Review: Room was tired bathroom fan not working bedside light fitting loose and covered in dust
Positive_Review: Location very good for central London staff very pleasant good public areas 5 mins from tube and buses

Negative_Review: Quite a disaster in that someone walked into my room another guest had been allocated the room some 5 hours after I had been If I had not been in the room she could have stolen my property Very poor on the part of the hotel Wi fi very poor too Breakfast was cold tea bacon and scrambled eggs Only redeeming feature was that they had gluten free bread As I had stayed here several times since 1976 I was very disappointed Food in the restaurant mainly Asian
Positive_Review: It s location Beside the main shops and underground Convenient to Kensington gardens and a good taxi service at the hotel

Negative_Review: The housekeeping could be a bit more alert forgot to place extra toilet paper and shampoo one day but the staff in general is very welcoming
Positive_Review: The location is perfect

Negative_Review: The rooms are incredibly tired We were on the first floor in a standard room and the room was very old and worn The walls were stained the bathroom door had a big chip at the bottom The bathtub itself had a burn mark inside The hotel provides a non slip mat for the bath but it s a discoloured grey with yellow stains around the suction spots It wasn t particularly nice to use touch There was an unmanned express checkout desk but no explanation of what to do We were made to wait to checkout it had to be done manually via computer Not ideal when pressed for time The wifi was quite poor kept cutting in and out It was difficult to plan our tours
Positive_Review: The location is very good only a few minutes walk from High Street Kensington station The beds are big It s cheap

Negative_Review: Breakfast was expensive so we went without Only discovered as we were leaving that we could have had coffee a croissant quite cheaply It would have been helpful if somebody had pointed that out initially One more gripe I left a T shirt behind in the room but when I rang to ask about it they seemed to know nothing about it The receptionist promised to ring me back about it but never did
Positive_Review: General appearance of hotel Helpfulness of staff

Negative_Review: Staff member in bar provided cutlery from the wrong end Was corrected but bar and food management should review this with staff
Positive_Review: Had upgrade and used executive lounge Great breakfast food and credit to staff and chefs

Negative_Review: Staff must be careful when pouring the hot tea they hold the teapot too high up and hot tea fell on my hand and on the table
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good and the room was clean Location was good and price w competitive

Negative_Review: Room too hot Bed uncomfortable Mattress was upside down We got the mattress reveresed Next day it had been incorrectly reversed again Also wash basin was blocked Some staff couldn t understand english
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Very small standard double room
Positive_Review: Not satisfied with room allocated on arrival Helpful receptionist and room upgrade Standard room size very small and noisy with interconnection rooms

Negative_Review: Decor needs revamp furniture badly marked Strange humming noise in room Walls very thin could hear next doors conversation Trains a bit noisy
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful very near to our venue and underground Area very good Room very clean

Negative_Review: Never enough milk or sugar in the room for hot drinks
Positive_Review: Staff so helpful room comfortable and quiet no people slamming doors or running up and down the corridors Breakfast plentiful

Negative_Review: The room was too hot and had an unpleasant sweaty smell the check in was extremmly slow not enough decaf coffee sachets and no biscuits in room
Positive_Review: Location clean hotel modern nice big tv handy coffee snack bar in lobby

Negative_Review: Window in the room not opening I was told you can on request which is not so convenient Rather small single beds which probably is standard for most hotels of this grade
Positive_Review: location clean value for money with reduction on line

Negative_Review: There was only one thing I think let s the hotel down and that is the exterior of the building it is outdated and tired Please don t let this put you off as its lovely inside
Positive_Review: Beautiful rooms and excellent staff nothing was too much trouble from hailing us a cab to making us some late night snacks Excellent shower so relaxing after a day in the city Super close to the Albert Hall too

Negative_Review: Many of the staff which were surprisingly numerous appear to be new at their jobs and could benefit from a bit more experience and training
Positive_Review: Very attentive staff and the concierge was the best in the business We were upgraded to Executive and given free drinks and breakfast because our room was not quite ready even though we were checking in very early Great

Negative_Review: I had trouble with my room key on a couple of occasions and had to return to reception to have it resolved I guess because it was close to my phone or i pad On arrival at 5 30pm my room wasn t ready This wasn t a problem for me but it could have been if I d been in a rush to get somewhere else However the receptionist was very apologetic and offered a drinks voucher for the bar My friends had arrived at about 4pm and had the same experience It didn t spoil our stay however and the staff were excellent Worth noting that my friends had also booked a club room theirs was on the tenth floor and wasn t quite as roomy as mine
Positive_Review: Club lounge breakfast was perfect lovely smiley and attentive staff nice selection of fresh fruit and yoghurt plus flaky croissants for breakfast and strong americano on request My room on twelfth floor and was a good size My bed was very comfortable I had slippers and bathrobe supplied and lovely clean towels were supplied on a daily basis We were in easy reach of restaurants museums and Kensington High Street tube Perfect location

Negative_Review: Check in is a bit of a bun fight with lines of guests reminiscent of a ride at Disney world The air conditioning packs up in the middle of the night making it very stuffy
Positive_Review: Reception staff were welcoming pleasant the location a block from Kensington High Street is excellent

Negative_Review: there was hairs in the bathroom the curtains didnt actually close properly and the noise was just so bad the room was far too hot
Positive_Review: it was big and it was clean the staff were ok

Negative_Review: Nothing I could really complain about everything was at an excellent standard
Positive_Review: Everything about the hotel was exceptional the room was lovely and the bed was very comfy

Negative_Review: I HAD TO CHANGE ROOM BECAUSE OF THE NOISE LEVELS OUTSIDE THE HOTEL THE STAFF WERE VERY HELPFUL BUT HAVING TO MOVE IN THE EARLY HOURS OF THE MORNING WAS VERY DISRUPTIVE
Positive_Review: THE STAFF WERE VERY HELPFUL AND OBLIGING

Negative_Review: I left an article of clothing on the bathroom door Although I phoned and spoke to a member of cleaning They did not find my article of clothing
Positive_Review: The size of hotel space The staff smiling near to the Alberte Hall

Negative_Review: Not much that we didn t like fact that some guests can be noisy in the hallway Therefore soundproofing could be better
Positive_Review: Good location within subway access Decent price for London Room is outdated but clean Not much of a view except for rail tracks Staff very helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: we had dinner in the restaurant twice the food and the service were excellent the gentleman who looked after us on Velentine s day was really wonderful helpfull and attentive

Negative_Review: All other staff dining room and bar were not so pleasant didn t notice anyone smile or even say hello The Full English breakfast was cold and the wifi extremely slow
Positive_Review: Beautiful hotel excellent location for getting around London The receptionist that checked us in was very helpful and friendly she answered all our questions confidently Room was very comfortable but could be a little noisy when the tubes were running

Negative_Review: The room was booked as a double and the bed looked like it was king size but was in fact two single beds pushed together not comfy at all
Positive_Review: Everything except the bed

Negative_Review: Internet is pathetic After check out if you have to wait in foyer not much in the way of seating available
Positive_Review: Comfortable Enjoyable breakfast Ideal for Albert Hall Pleasant lady in shop very helpful

Negative_Review: Breakfast too expensive so we ate out Also the main Asian restaurant in the hotel had hardly any vegetarian options
Positive_Review: The bar and bar staff were lovely and friendly Great location Shops tube station and good restaurants are all walking distance

Negative_Review: Bad check in wanted an extra 30 to check in 20 minutes before 3pm Very rude bellboy Wifi didn t work Tv didn t work Hair in the bath Toothpaste on the mirror and a mouldy shower curtain
Positive_Review: No much the bed was clean

Negative_Review: Only thing that was sad was that they were empty of the Ask Alfred teddy for the kids
Positive_Review: The kids felt so special at arrival and throughout our stay and that was the most important thing to me as it was their vacation The staff was super helpful and friendly We got free breakfast all three days and our single beds were put together to a kingsize bed with extra pillows so we didnt need a spare bed for the the youngest one Location was perfect just a short walk from the underground the museums we were going to and Diana memorial playground and much more Being so central in London you could think there would be much noise from the city but it was actually very peaceful and quiet This was our second stay here and we will certainly come back again

Negative_Review: Breakfeast can be ameliorated more kinds of cheese more danish pastry and yoghurts
Positive_Review: Perfect staff helpful to offer free late check out and taking care about a pre delivery package on my name to the concierge

Negative_Review: Decor in rooms a little outdated and unable to open the window as next to a train line
Positive_Review: Croissants and coffee at the small barista counter were excellent and value for money Good bathroom facilities

Negative_Review: No plugs near the bed to charge phone ipad TV in my room 1266 did not work Message notification at 4am which was a hoax to get me to reception to pay my bill on a card they already had used to take the money
Positive_Review: Location quality of facilities proximity to tube and shops

Negative_Review: The noise from the tube line behind the hotel noises until midnight and again from 5 am watch out if the tube goes 24 hour Should be ok on the front of the hotel
Positive_Review: Good high quality hotel

Negative_Review: The cleaners were better last year
Positive_Review: Helpfull personels works in reseption luggage and bar departments As their kind I feel like I m at home Thanks again for my collueges

Negative_Review: The TV and the lights in the room were faulty The maintenance staff and porters helped me to get the TV and lights on many times They were very kind and patient The wiring needs to be seen to The WiFi sometimes did not work All in all disappointing
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: My sister paid debit card and it was deducted twice She was a bit unsettled this happened Hotel currently sorting it out
Positive_Review: No complaints with room

Negative_Review: decor was dated bathroom shower curtain hanging off decor dated
Positive_Review: Birthday cake in room for my daughter nice touch Room was fine but dated for where the hotel is I would of expected it to be better decorated

Negative_Review: Upgraded room for an extra 30 per night bad choice as Club Room was very tired and the following reasons added to experience Overlooking Train Line Dirty Fridge on arrival Dirty fresh towel on 2nd night The breakfast service was exceptionally poor Lukewarm tea and coffee on first morning Rubber eggs served and had to wait 30 mins on Sun morning to get a table left and went to Muffin Man across the road 3rd morning again lukewarm tea served returned and ordered 2 pots fresh tea served as it should be hot Waitress unable to speak proper English A Romanian Girl All in all the breakfast experience was exceptionally poor
Positive_Review: Location Free WiFi and room size

Negative_Review: Hotel was very busy lots of people checking in and out 6 elevators but only 2 were working so we had to wait ages to go up to our room Our room was OK old a bit tired and quite small Air con works way too loud as well as small fridge under the TV Breakfast at the hotel is 12 pounds per person however not much to choose from and dishes did not change over 5 days we have stayed there Breakfast time also very crowded
Positive_Review: Location was great Underground and buses going to central London Harrods Westfield are just few steps away from the hotel Lots of shops and restaurants Very convenient location Big window and comfortable bed in the room Staff very friendly and helpful We had in room dining few times and the service was very fast spaghetti carbonara very tasty

Negative_Review: When in female clothing and normally not mistaken for a male I object to being called Sir
Positive_Review: helpfulness of the staff Excellent breakfast menu comfortable bed Quiet

Negative_Review: Breakfast a little bit of a production line on the weekend prob easier to have room service expect its fine on week days Still very tasty
Positive_Review: Excellent air conditioning and although train tracks behind didn t hear it at all A stones throw from the Babylon roof garden restaurant too

Negative_Review: Couldn t open windows to get fresh air for obvious safety reasons Despite air con I personally found it a little too warm
Positive_Review: I was really worried about taking the car into London and where to park When we arrived at Copthorne Tara Hotel in the early evening it was a breeze Drove straight into their well lit basement car park and found several available spaces A stairwell is available from the car park to the reception We were greeted by very friendly and helpful staff Our club room was on the 10th floor Very clean and comfortable bed As we could access the Club Lounge we managed to avoid the long queue at breakfast and be in a more quiet setting Lovely breakfast with lots of choice and very attentive staff The location of this Hotel is within easy walking distance to museums and the Royal Albert Hall Would definitely book again

Negative_Review: The room was a very poor standard Upon arrival we paid 40 extra to upgrade to a superior double room The room was in a very poor condition The double bed was two singles joined together The wardrobe door was broken There was pipes and wires exposed around the room There was grime on the bath taps and the bath was very dirty and needed replacing The kettle has lime scale on the outside of it and the cups were dirty upon arrival The breakfast that we paid for was cold My juice was warmer than my eggs Overall it was a very poor standard and nothing like the pictures advertised I would recommend trying the holiday inn next door before this one
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel was good It was a short walk from High Street Kensington tube station

Negative_Review: The hotel is tired and needs modernising on a grand scale We were not told that the tube runs directly under our window if we had been we would have requested a room on the other side of the building The bathroom was old and needed a refit On one of the days they forgot to clean our room
Positive_Review: The location and price for the area is outstanding

Negative_Review: The bed linen was too small for the king size bed as a consequence my husband stole all the duvet
Positive_Review: Club Lounge for Breakfast is fantastic although they had a few problems with the toaster the smell of burning toast is not pleasant

Negative_Review: The room was quite warm The fridge was noisy and we did not have the option to turn it off though it did go quiet overnight
Positive_Review: All round it was good Polite and very helpful staff Check out time good Guest services excellent so you do not have to queue at reception Very clean The location was excellent

Negative_Review: Hard pillows Few rowdy people late on Look of outside of building
Positive_Review: Staff helpful friendly and keen to help Inside of building good Choice of restaurants

Negative_Review: Air conditioning and fridge are a bit noisy and bed was on the small size by today s standards
Positive_Review: Hotel is very conveniently positioned for the tube and the London museums that can be reached through the royal park Staff were very helpful and the hotel was good value

Negative_Review: Nothing comes to mind
Positive_Review: The room was airy spacious and had good views over London The staff were communicative pleasant and the person on Reception friendly competent and effective and helpful

Negative_Review: Not enough sockets in useful locations near bedside Had to crawl under desk to plug in unplug kettle to charge phone Small details in bathroom one day we has bathmats instead on hand towels and we had 2 lots of shampoo and no shower gel
Positive_Review: Clean comfortable room

Negative_Review: The only problem I found with the rooms was the hairdryer as it was push to use making it very difficult to use
Positive_Review: Central to High Street Kensington great value for money and lovely facilities Definitely will be back

Negative_Review: Despite it being a quiet room not over looking the tube track It wasn t Heard the person in the next door room coughing going to the bathroom Also i could hear the lift going up down in the shaft
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The manager and staff went the extra mile to ensure that my business stay was a success and went to extraordinary lengths to make that happen Very polite helpful and will be top of my list the next time for a stay

Negative_Review: Room Air con heating not working Room in need of refurbishment my like to look at way rooms are cleaned when I was in the bath could see that underneath sink areas had NIT been cleaned
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The lighting system had to out of bed to turn lights off switches not close enough to bed The staff in restaurant didn t seem aware of guests very quick to serve coffee and clear dishes away not aware not enough bowls plates etc for breakfast Could do with service etiquette Walked around in a bit of a daze at times
Positive_Review: The room was clean and a good size

Negative_Review: Can t think of anything
Positive_Review: Room was actually larger than I had expected for London service was excellent and the location was excellent would highly recommend to freinds and family fabulous deal at a great price

Negative_Review: When we checked in we were told breakfast wasnt included i was nearly certain i had paid for it but couldnt prove it as i had no internet I upgraded the room so i could get breakfast and wifi the superior rooms are practically the same as standard not worth it i cancelled my upgrade once i proved i had paid for breakfast previously at time of booking hopefully i should get refunded soon also One room for breakfast felt neglected When we got in there were no bowls or plates once we got them it was fine Asian restaurant area
Positive_Review: Hotel was expected was happy with standard rooms Breakfast was nice plenty of choice

Negative_Review: In the bar we were ushered to a table when we only wanted a drink at the bar We then had to pay 10 service charge and felt ripped off
Positive_Review: The break fast was delicious great value and the service was speedy even when the dining room was full The staff were very polite

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good value for money Staff were so helpful Excellent recommendations from them Location very good Rooms slightly dated but clean Lovely shower and breakfast was good

Negative_Review: Wash hand basin slow to drain Very happy about everything else so no further comment required
Positive_Review: The warmest welcome at reception an assurance that the room was quiet located away from lifts tube station Small snack bar area in reception ensured a range of soft drinks hot soup of the day sandwiches etc Prices reasonable too Toiletries replaced everyday fresh towels too

Negative_Review: We were woke up at 8am by maids to find out when we were vacating the room the lights were out it the bath room so had to wait till they were fixed to have a shower there was no iron in the room so had to wait for that
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Reception personnel not able to speak English The bed in the room is very small bed width of 1 4 is not classed as a double bed At least not in my country
Positive_Review: Great location and clean room Upgraded to a higher class room upon arrival

Negative_Review: The lights in my room were difficult to figure out
Positive_Review: The nice check in receptionist upgraded me when I asked for a quiet room and didn t even tell me

Negative_Review: The synthetic bedding can be a bit uncomfortable and a spare slim pillow would be a good idea All Large pillows will not suit everyone
Positive_Review: Room more than adequete spacious and met our needs

Negative_Review: Poor WiFi reception resulted in us being unable to book cinema tickets for an evening performance This was disappointing as we had planned an evening in the West End
Positive_Review: Ease of location

Negative_Review: Plugs under furniture near the floor Hair dryer with a cord suitable for midgets Totally impossible log in procedure for wi fi intercontinental and Royal Garden Hotels don t even have log in sink that didn t empty lights that came on in the middle of the night very hot room very complicated lighting But I suppose you get what you pay for
Positive_Review: Nice atmosphere in the lobby good music very chilled

Negative_Review: Room service very poor gave up trying to call and complain as no one ever answered the telephone and when they did it was just the operator No internet service in my room again complained on numerous occasions with nothing resolved Don t stay here if you would like good service
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Room was very very hot Even with the air conditioning on at full speed When we complained next morning they said we should of done it during the night and they would have sent someone up to investigate What were they going to do Send in an engineer Either way we were going to be disturbed either by the engineer or by the heat So we were very unhappy about it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bar was quite expensive but as it s London it is to be expected
Positive_Review: Location was perfect tube station at the top of the street or taxis ready and waiting at the door Hotel was spotless nice sized room and staff extremely helpful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The Hotel was only a 5 min walk from the tube Kensington High Street tube and convenient for shopping and attractions our room was clean and nicely made up

Negative_Review: Fridge in room No minibar and couldn t understand the point of the fridge

Negative_Review: The hotel was extremely busy during the beakfast period Although we didn t have breakfast and didn t have to wait in the queues each morning it was extremely difficult getting to the ground floor to exit the hotel The lifts were full waiting time lengthy on the one occasion we managed to secure a place in the lift we travelled from the second floor up to floor 10 stopping at each floor on the way up and on the way down The hallways were full with people waiting on each floor to go down to the ground floor the stairways are difficult to find No sign posts to stairways and those marked discourage use by indicating it was a fire escape route only and not a normal stairway I asked the concierge about the usage of the stairs and his reply was its difficult We located the stairs and used them but we are fit and able with no heavy luggage others were not so fortunate

Negative_Review: I had stayed at this hotel a few times before I made a non refundable booking on booking com as were the cases before Upon check in the reception staff said I would have to make a payment I pointed out that the hotel charged my credit card before check in and I was told that my stay was pre paid at the check in for my previous stays The staff said she double checked and my stay this time was not prepaid So I reluctantly agreed that the hotel charges my credit card at the time of the check in A few days later checking my credit card statement I found that the hotel charged my credit card twice Obviously I disputed about one of the payments through my credit card company but it required extra time and efforts Wifi was unstable and sometimes completely lost internet access Cups and spoons had visible stains

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The rooms were lovely and the beds were incredibly comfy Plenty of people complained about the hotel being dated but it was spot on very clean with good facilities Staff were very helpful The location was excellent being a 5 minute walk from Kensington high street and the tube station Can t recommend it enough

Negative_Review: The steep rise in price when we looked to book again for 14th March

Negative_Review: The heating was a little noisy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent location especially for Albert hall helpful friendly staff lovely rooms with comfy bed finished off with a great Buffet cooked breakfast

Negative_Review: Perhaps you can be a little overattentive On arrival we had just about got ourselves sorted out after travelling and were about to settle down for 40 winks when Reception rang to enquire if all was OK Last evening after returning from the Albert Hall we just wanted a quiet little something for a late night snack At 11 00pm the Brasserie was quite noisey with a number of children running around We tried to sit away from the noise but were moved away from the table of our choice because it was already set for breakfast We noticed another couple who came in for a nightcap similarly affected On the positive front the location is first class and it s likely that we will use the hotel in the future
Positive_Review: The lovely soft water in the shower

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent helpful staff Very good wine A bit pricy though Bar reception staff really helpful Great location Look forward to our next stay in spring

Negative_Review: 2 Single beds unnecessary small for such a big room We needed to put two beds next to each other to prevent falling off the beds
Positive_Review: Location good service spacious clean room

Negative_Review: Lifts a little slow Looks dull from the outside but looks are deceiving
Positive_Review: Beautiful room Club room on 10th floor helpful staff Nice breakfast Just a short walk from Kensington High St tube station Dinner in Artist Corner restaurant was excellent and so nice not to have to go out in the cold to find a nice place to eat

Negative_Review: Light contrtoller hangingoff wall poor water strenght from tap and shower Unable to obtain normal TV Channels such as Film on 4 ITV2 IT4 etc which should be available from any freeview set and the Remote control worked intermitently Did not like the touch controller for the lights difficult to use at night Club lounge was being refurbished temporary arrangement not good
Positive_Review: Location just behind Kensington High Street Tube Station and Parking Gastro pub s Abingdon and Britannia in easy walking distance

Negative_Review: We felt we were discriminated at breakfast as we were put in a room on our own and told the main breakfast room was full although there was another hour left to eat no one else was shown into our room The food in the serving dishes was cold and bread was stale The tea that was poured was so black and stewed it must have been in the pot a long time When we complained we were asked if we wanted to move but it was then too late we had already finished
Positive_Review: It s a brilliant location for the Olympia horse show The staff are friendly and the hotel is very clean and rooms and beds very comfortable

Negative_Review: The food in the Brasserie and at breakfast was not the greatest
Positive_Review: The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly Free nibbles and drinks in the lounge was a wonderful added bonus

Negative_Review: If you prefer to sleep in a cool room remember to turn the central heating down on arrival
Positive_Review: This hotel is perfectly situated for Kensington High Street and nearby attractions

Negative_Review: The key card could have worked first time without having to trek to reception again to ge it sorted Breakfast seemed expensive so we went to a local cafe
Positive_Review: Handy for the underground Just stayed one night so didn t explore the full facilities of the hotel

Negative_Review: Asking staff to top up plates to put your breakfast on They did not appear to have a system for replenishing crockery only foodstuffs
Positive_Review: The upgrade to club as have been to this hotel four times previously The staff are friendly and we like the location Being to go to the bar and order food quite late into the evening

Negative_Review: I have NOTHING negative to say at all
Positive_Review: Loved everything The breakfasts were superb tasty with a vast selection The room club room had fabulous views across London including the Eye the Shard and the Royal Albert Hall The beds were comfy and the shower was powerful The room was very clean as was the reception area with coffee shop Staff were friendly polite and helpful It is 3 or 4 minutes walk to the tube station and high street Kensington Palace is only 10 minutes away and there are plenty of places to eat Both my son and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay there again no question

Negative_Review: Breakfast was a disaster We had pre booked and went down at 9 30am on a Sunday morning expecting a few people There were probably a hundred people queued up waiting There was no way we were waiting that long I asked for a refund and we left
Positive_Review: Perfect location for Olympia we walked from the hotel Room was clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Did not take payment until day of booking and as this was booked by me through Bookings com I was furious to discover that our company card was refused as I was not there in person to pay I had booked it for our trustees staying in London for the night and fully expected that my company card would be debited as it appeared to be at the time of booking at the non refundable rate The hotel and Bookings com were unhelpful and our trustees had to pay themselves Not good business and very annoying
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Even though I booked for 2 adults and a child they refused to give an extra bed for my daughter They demanded an extra 35 Pounds for this I showed them the confirmation from booking com and they told me it was a mistake on behalf of booking com The chef at breakfast buffet extremely rude towards guests for leaving the bain maries lids open especially towards senior citizens For a start the lids were heavy and opened all the way towards the back and quite tricky to close once opened especially when you have your plate on the other hand as there is no space to rest your plate To my horror the waiting staff and the supervisor simply watched in amusement as this guy lashed out continiously for the 45 minutes we were there
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The staff were useless There were many examples but the main one was when I asked concierge how long it takes to travel by taxi to the airport and the answer I received was I dunno Then I asked how to get there using public transport and again the answer was I dunno There are only 3 airports in london so concierge should really know the details of how to get to all of them
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Breakfast was good value staff are a credit to the company maids were excellent and friendly nothing to much trouble Booked Christmas light open top tour with hotel excellent

Negative_Review: The breakfast though plentiful was not on same par as evening meal e g tea was overly stewed pace was more like fast food outlet given pressure on accommodation
Positive_Review: Great location close to Royal Albert Hall Great staff great and helpful staff when checking in Room extremely comfortable with complimentary water Dinner in Artists Corner section of dining room was excellent Lifts speedy though much in demand at breakfast time

Negative_Review: The Bfast was not great but then they had a very high volume of guests more like a canteen scramble Also the staff at the bar in the evening v good just a pity the decor lets them down
Positive_Review: The staff at reception and the lobby and concierge staff excellent v much appreciated Of course nothing works without the cleaning ladies Bar staff even if v busy v effecient and pleasant

Negative_Review: Bathrooms looking a bit tired but everything worked perfectly
Positive_Review: Great value for money on a special deal Good room size Great that they have a fridge which can be used not full of overpriced drinks

Negative_Review: Pillows hard and flat
Positive_Review: Location for a visit to The Royal Albert Hall was perfect Hotel was clean and comfortable Breakfast excellent value for money

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Every body was so helpful in a most pleasant manner It was a special visit to the Royal Albert hall and it made everything a lovely experience when a disappointing stay could have spoilt everything Well done to everyone

Negative_Review: The hotel is old and room had many spots of old broken needs to be renovated Drinks are ridiculously expensive and staff came across as very inexperienced
Positive_Review: Location is perfect

Negative_Review: The room was unbearably warm although we literally just used the room to sleep in it was particularly uncomfortable tried to lower the temp using the air conditioning but didn t make any difference After informing the staff on checkout the girl didn t seem at all bothered which i didn t appreciate
Positive_Review: Location was good

Negative_Review: The bath had some chips indentations in it The mini bar was merely an empty fridge I would have liked a couple of wine glasses to be available we had to take them up from the bar
Positive_Review: A very comfortable stay

Negative_Review: Decor wise the hotel is very dated There is not enough capacity in the lifts when it is busy so everyone was having to use the emergency fire escape stairs not ideal
Positive_Review: The location is excellent the staff were very helpful and polite

Negative_Review: The elevators in the morning were terrible People waited for more than 30 min with their luggage to go down No stairs to the lobby by the end we could get down via stairs outside the hotel and did a whole circle to get back in the hotel
Positive_Review: The location is very good nice breakfast the room was OK we could get late checkout which was very helpful

Negative_Review: being asked as we checked in what time we were checking out the first room was rubbish phone socket hanging off the wall dirty old not what we were expecting
Positive_Review: speedy checkout

Negative_Review: two wall lamps of our room 466 were out of order I also cannot accept that a 4 star hotel does not have a decent luggage weighing scales We were given an ordinary bathroom scales which gave a false reading it read 20 4 kg when at the airport it weight 25 4kg The food in their restaurant is very expensive The price given does not include the VAT and the service charge Will never eat there again
Positive_Review: the room was comfortable and the buffet breakfast was very well liked Taxi service is very good We paid 55 Stg to go to Heathrow

Negative_Review: Breakfast service in the Club Lounge was extremely poor We ve stayed there several times over the years Front of house staff are less friendly than before
Positive_Review: Reaction of housekeeping staff to a malfunctioning hair dryer was Fast Friendly and Effective

Negative_Review: Sheets washed in a non bio rather than starch type product I do not like being obliged to pay Service Charge in the Bar for my food I prefer to give what I think is fair based on Service received Your receipts also include a tip on top of Service Charge Ridiculous as people are being paid to do their job
Positive_Review: The overall experience was good

Negative_Review: The room was rather weary and could benefit from better soundproofing Could hear talking from other rooms as welll as tube trains All the power outlets were at baseboard level which was problematic for hair iron
Positive_Review: Rooms were quite large for London Staff were lovely

Negative_Review: For some reason my debit card was not debited at the time of booking or when we checked in or out 2 weeks later they got in touch with a form to fill in with my card details to send back in the post You guessed They say these details never arrived I thought it was a bit odd asking me to send this info by post and now I m worried my name address and card has fallen into the wrong hands probably a dodgy member of staff at the hotel So it still hasn t been paid not my fault and they are sending me emails asking for payment but no apology for their incompetence So be careful Now I have to cancel my card And it s nearly Christmas And it s all their fault And I m quite cheesed off actually
Positive_Review: Good location Pretty standard budget hotel so it s cheap without the risk of finding you have booked an absolute dive

Negative_Review: The bathroom could be more cleaner and the shower curtains seemed to be old and was a little dirty We had to shut off the fridge every night due to irritating noises
Positive_Review: The breakfast and bed was nice We had a Club room on the 12th floor and the room was very nice and cozy

Negative_Review: The heating system was not working and although they sent someone to fix it It did not improve and had to change rooms but this was done with little fuss so it was not to bad I think their system want to be brought into the 21st century
Positive_Review: The beds were very comfortable

Negative_Review: Tired rooms Uncomfortable bed with cheap pillow and cover Someone tried to come into our room on three occasions and that was just the times we were there
Positive_Review: location

Negative_Review: Room was very small club room too there was a railway track outside and the secondary glazing didn t work The bed was the hardest i have ever slept on and was so squeaky every time you moved it made a noise The club lounge was so busy we had to wait for 30 mins for breakfast the eggs benidict we ordered was cold as was sent back The staff had no idea on how to serve we asked for a knife and fork for my wife when the replacement eggs turned up and he actually laid them across her plate of food
Positive_Review: The front desk staff were great

Negative_Review: The hotel is a bit old fashioned and could use some tender loving care
Positive_Review: Staff was friendly attentive and flexible The room superior double was comfortable and of a good size

Negative_Review: Group 5 together with 1 person in wheelchair Wanted to sit together for breakfast they kept saying only had tables for2 or 4 tried to get them to push together but said unable eventually after fuss they did not rocket science Happened both mornings As for getting a pot tea not the coloured cold weak water in flask well
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: The reception service was slow It would have been helpful if the receptionist had told us about the necessity to use room key in the lift as it was not obvious The room was stuffy with a window that was locked shut We were unable to get the room temperature turned down It took us ages to find the switch which operated the bedside light It was hidden behind a pillow
Positive_Review: It was handy for Kensington Town Hall The room was adequate and the bed was comfy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: staff were friendly and welcoming Andrei on reception was excellent he had only been with the hotel 2 weeks but was so helpful and happy a real addition to any team

Negative_Review: The food in the restaurant was poor and we only ate there once the breakfast was also a disappointment
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfy the room was basic but was ok for a base

Negative_Review: Evening menu was limited Singaporean Chinese Can t comment on the quality as we chose to eat in one of the many quality local eateries
Positive_Review: Breakfast every bit what you would expect from a decent hotel location second to none friendly and efficient service

Negative_Review: Having to queue for breakfast every morning is not what I expect in a 4 star hotel We ate in the bar one night and they brought the wrong order
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: the attitude of staff very rude management unconcernerned about guest concerns and issues regarding hotel problems my room was locked twice as it was assumed that i had not paid my bill when in fact it had been came back to hotel at midnight and discovered room had been locked had to pay there and then when in fact i had already paid very poor administration not even a appoligy made me feel like a criminal
Positive_Review: very close to shops tube station and plenty of restaurants and pubs

Negative_Review: Although it was lovely to have a Christmas tree in reception it meant there was considerably less seating
Positive_Review: Quiet room which I asked for away from the lifts

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: Very pleasent stay for 5 nights Location is quite and close to tube station room cleanliness and facilities is good Check in out smooth and easy Highly recommend this hotel for any one visiting london especially for first time

Negative_Review: Check in was slow despite staff milling around My room was tired a little grubby in places and the flush mechanism on the toilet in my room broke causing water to pour out of the area behind the toilet as well as into the bath Response time to this incident was poor and despite the engineer being able to see that I had used all the towels available to soak up the flood it was left for me to discover that if there is such a department as housekeeping they never answer the phone Exhausting stay won t use this hotel again it s not worth the money for a poor nights sleep
Positive_Review: Foyer and bar were comfortable

Negative_Review: The room thermostat did not work efficiently The room was cold and I m a person who normally prefers fairly low temperatures The room furniture was tired e g some drawers did not close and the wash basin drainage system required attention The bed was unrealistically narrow
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent in all respects The breakfast was of a high standard and the associated service commendable

Negative_Review: I had a very bad experience in the Oriental restaurant the team leader created a horrible experience so the food didn t taste good when surrounded by stressed staff shame that you allow your senior staff to bully the younger team
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Could have had kingsize duvet extreme wait for breakfast know busy time for all but have stayed at other hotels and never encountered such a wait Pathetic maybe staff should clear tables quicker and staff more on the ball ie more coffee etc you had to ask them will not use again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The reception staff were passive aggressive rude have found this a few times when I have stayed at the hotel on check in Although the guy who done the express check out was nice
Positive_Review: Excellent location room clean a fridge in the room

Negative_Review: Room cleanliness poor Staff looked unhappy and not helpful at all with the exception of the concierge who was very helpful and should give some training to the others Porter you can do without because he does not seem to do anything just the same Not even once we saw him smile let alone basic greeting We travelled for medical reasons and need to extend our stay by 4 days went to reception bluntly was told sorry we re full up Understand that hotel could be fullup but the way it was done and no help offered whatsoever Was told to call reservations from the room and it took more than 20 minutes to answer Hope this feedback will help because this is what I would want in reverse
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Wifi connectivity in the bedroom was hopeless
Positive_Review: The staff were all very helpful especially the staff in the club room the gentleman who served in the evenings and also the lady who seemed in charge at breakfast during our stay They both made us feel very welcome

Negative_Review: The fact that they take the cost of your booking twice and then return one after your stay at least two business days later
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel and helpful staff

Negative_Review: Dinner in the brassiere bar Queue for breakfast but I do appreciate that everyone wants to eat at once but more table clearers needed to be drafted in
Positive_Review: All very clean and tidy

Negative_Review: Extremely big corridor Had a 5 min walk to get to my room only
Positive_Review: Location is perfect Rooms are big and spacious Hotel is 5 mins walk from underground

Negative_Review: The bathroom and decor were dated and need refurbishing
Positive_Review: The Club room that we paid extra for It made us feel a little soeciL because if the personal service we received

Negative_Review: We found nothing to complain about Sometimes we had to wait for a table at breakfast
Positive_Review: Nice quiet location easy to get to the tube and buses Comfortable clean bedroom

Negative_Review: Firstly the car park has tiny spaces and difficult to manoeuvre around with many cars parking across two spaces do they pay double I wonder There is no lift from the car park to reception so you walk down a dingy corridor with hanging pipes and cables through doors with chipped paint and up about 20 steps struggling with luggage to reception Here you wait in a queue for about ten minutes to check in because guess what only three of the six check in desks are manned and a coach load of tourists has just beaten you to check in We ask a bored looking concierge if there is somewhere for our 82 year old disabled mother to sit whilst we get our key and are directed to a few stools in an area cordoned off by a red rope which he makes no attempt to move for us so we can gain access so we move it ourselves We finally check in but only after having to give again exactly the same information that we had given when making the original booking We were then asked what time we were checking out on our leaving day Not soon enough I was tempted to reply and we had only been here about half an hour We were due to go to a show at the Albert Hall so back to our friendly concierge once again but he said he didn t know where the Albert Hall was but asked an equally bored looking colleague who muttered it would be five minutes by cab My faith would have been lifted a little if he has said brightly Let me know what time you wish to leave sir and I will hail a cab for your party but I suppose we can only dream We had booked two rooms together so we re not really surprised when one was on the first floor and the other on the fifth The rooms were clean but basic with ultra thin pillows no choice of pillow like Premier Inn and the narrowest double bed I have seen in a hotel for a good many years now and we have been to quite a few We decided to eat at the Brasserie before going to our show
Positive_Review: Nothing much apart from the location

Negative_Review: Had to queue for breakfast Lifts had problems during our visit
Positive_Review: The reception staff in particular were most helpful and pleasant The hotel was very nice and quite posh for us Good cooked breakfast

Negative_Review: The wait to get to the dining area for breakfast was 15mins Also tried to used the stairs from the 8th floor as there was a wait for the lifts not easy to find the stairs or the way out using them
Positive_Review: Location good all nice easy

Negative_Review: Noisy guests in the early hours of the morning not the hotel s fault
Positive_Review: Room clean and comfortable Staff very friendly and helpful Hotel well positioned for RAH and bus service to city

Negative_Review: Food wine for an event I was there for was absolutely diabolical The lift system was a shambles it took me 25mins to get from the 11th floor to reception with all my luggage prior to checkout Wifi reception was patchy and although I got it for free with a club room should not be charged for in 2016
Positive_Review: Reception staff friendly upgraded my room

Negative_Review: nothing excellence service trated with the height of respect respect to all
Positive_Review: the overall standard of the hotel and staff was 5 very professional checking in and out amazing value location in london couldnt be better for tube walking or driving 11 10

Negative_Review: There was a problem with the lifts which caused some inconvenience and a lot of tension for some other guests I have stayed here a number of times and there has never been a problem before so hopefully it was a one off and shouldn t put people off staying here

Negative_Review: The room was much too hot even with the heat turned off The room was noisy as we were on the tube line side of the hotel Room 401 We were there for two nights and neither day did the staff leave any shampoo or bath gel foam I had to ask for it It did arrive promptly It was obvious that the staff did not check the bathrooms properly
Positive_Review: The staff were very good when I needed a bowl spoon and milk in the room for my wife I collected them from the dining room at breakfast time I had a good deal which made it seem better

Negative_Review: Couldn t see a hairdryer in the room but as we only stayed one night unfortunately it was needed But I m sure if I had asked for one I m sure one would of appeared
Positive_Review: We got upgraded but was given a double bed and we booked a twin they couldn t do enough for us and soon changed it to two singles as I was travelling with my sister Was really impressed with the staff

Negative_Review: Can t say there was anything
Positive_Review: We always go to this hotel once a year when Christmas shopping it is an ideal location for Harrods Sloane Sq and Oxford st Near great restaurants to use in evening

Negative_Review: Train noise
Positive_Review: The overall experience from booking into booking out was excellent with one proviso the noise from the Underground trains was excessive and needs to be addressed

Negative_Review: Sound proofing is awful This isn t acceptable I don t expect to be woken up in the morning by a couple having a conversation at normal volume
Positive_Review: Clean spacious and great location

Negative_Review: The bed was to small and hard the bathroom was old and the towels were hard and not white the hair dryer was in a silly place the TV controls were not working well the room was to hot and noise of the trains woke me up to early part from that great There was a big que for breakfast we went out for breakfast in the end apart from that it was good I would stay there again
Positive_Review: The lift was good The shop inside the hotel was handy but expensive The bar was good

Negative_Review: The Airton in the room didn t work that we ll and you couldn t open the window Very stuffy

Negative_Review: Looks a bit dated from outside but is lovely inside Well worth the stay
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly Room very nice comfortable Late bar and disco Food was lovely lots of chioce Great location for shops and tube station Will definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: The breakfast area was very busy and travelling alone I felt a bit uncomfortable sitting next to full tables It would have been nice to have had a quiet section offered to me

Negative_Review: More flexibility because of my mistake in double booking I have been charged and debited inspite of several horal and written promises from booking com staff by more than 400 GBP which is totally unfair I still hope you can help me out from this horrible situation to show my loyalty to the hotel I upgraded my reservation to Club level with breakfast I was staying in this hotel already for 6 or 7 tomes before
Positive_Review: Breakfast perfect room kept clean staff at Guest Service extra helpful Tommy

Negative_Review: Internet is very poor in the bedrooms This was very frustrating as i needed the internet for business purposes
Positive_Review: Rooms were a good size and the bathrooms Great to have a fridge in the room Staff responded immediately to a request for extra clothing hangars clean towels every day which were plentiful

Negative_Review: Staff could have been more helpful Particularly when checking in after an early morning flight

Negative_Review: Ordered rm service for breakfast but didnt turn up When call to complaint was told to wait for 45 60 mins As we are in a hurry to attend a impt meeting decide to go restaurant for breakfast but there was a v long queue so decide to forgo breakfast all together Not a good start to a v impt morning
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Beds seemed a bit hard
Positive_Review: Location and Food great Mohammed the Commissionaire was very friendly and helpful credit to your company Car Parking brilliant right outside he Hotel

Negative_Review: Room was not ready at 5pm The rooms we got 2 next to each other one room was good and one room was a bit dated the bathroom door never closed TV needed repair coat hangers didnt work Attention to detail from house keeping could be improved
Positive_Review: Kensington

Negative_Review: I booked this stay for my elderly parents who were visiting London One evening my parents needed a doctor The staff did not call a doctor at all and kept on lying to my parents that one was on the way my parents stayed up waiting all night When we found the manager the next morning his explanation was that they could not understand my fathers accent and that they did not take cash payments despite the fact that my credit card was on file and they succesfully billed for a 10day stay My family has stayed at this hotel over the years on our London breaks and it is an excellent hotel great location with majority lovely staff I was livid at this negligent treatment but my parents refused to move because of the kindness of some of the staff But clearly this is completely beyond the pale I will never recommend this hotel and do not entrust them to do the right thing for the safety of their guests
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Basic room
Positive_Review: Reception and bar good but rooms surprisingly basic need a refresh Sheets did not even cover the whole bed Paying for location and flash reception

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: We always use this hotel as we drive to London from Shropshire and can always find a parking spot at the hotel We always enjoy eating at the Bugis Street Will be back again at the end of the month

Negative_Review: Not much we didn t like but couldn t get in club lounge at breakfast I had to get concierge to let us in as our key didn t work
Positive_Review: Nice using club lounge for breakfast and a nice club room thought we could have had tissues and biscuits in room also maybe dressing gowns

Negative_Review: The bathroom lacked ventilation there was still a Manufacturer label on the side of the wash basin The room took a long time to warm up

Negative_Review: The queue for breakfast was horrendous especially as I needed to eat and be on time for my course The lifts were overcrowded with no stairs as an option The front desk neede more staff

Negative_Review: The double beds are the standard ones I much prefer king or super king sizes

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to an Executive Club room on the 11th floor so no noise from the traffic and nearby trains Clean and comfortable room and all staff we met were all cheerful and helpful

Negative_Review: No snacks available in lounge from when we checked in at 1 until we left at 5 50 I know they are there for pre dinner canap s from about 6 30 but thats when we were out A 24 7 supply of crisps and biscuits which it said would be available on the paperwork would be good

Positive_Review: The location is convenient very near the tube and high street Kensington Value for money

Negative_Review: The concierges don t seem to know much about directions for example The cleaners in our room threw away a couple of valueless things which nobody asked them to get rid off A piece of a peel off a wrap remained on the floor for the three days

Negative_Review: Nothing needed to be better

Negative_Review: Breakfast was very expensive so we went to a cafe round the corner
Positive_Review: Location brilliant rooms very clean and spacious Shower powerful with lots of hot water

Negative_Review: The postcode and sat nav coordinates are in correct which at midnight when trying to find hotel is appalling Didn t have us marked down for breakfast which it clearly states on the booking They couldnt decide whether we had paid or not Asked for water in the room and got none Not a very good start to a stay at all
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Would have liked a magnifying makeup mirror in the bathroom better bathroom lighting
Positive_Review: Very clean very quiet very convenient Loved the little brasserie where you could grab a coffee or cold drink to go Perfect for us

Negative_Review: The beds are far too small ln most hotels beds are 5 to 6 foot My daughter is over 6ft 2 her feet hung out over the bed

Negative_Review: Bathroom was basic but clean and good pressure on shower
