Negative_Review: The staff was slow dismissive and didn t give the right information when asked Would rather be told I don t know then the wrong answers
Positive_Review: The room was cosy

Negative_Review: Room not properly prepared Half used soap still in shower and on bath display Carpet not hoovered Hoover left outside door and was still there in the morning Not a double bed as purchased but 2 singles pushed together Disappointing stay
Positive_Review: Location Staff very friendly Food good

Negative_Review: Very disappointing compared with previous stays First room we were given was small and had a safe on the floor which we could not reach Moved to a better room similar to previous Club rooms we had occupied On second day when we returned in the evening we found that the bed was unmade and the room not cleaned This was done when we contacted reception Altogether rather tired fabric and tired staff A great pity and a sad decline as previous stays had been fine
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The rooms needed renevating especially the bathroom which had a dirty shower curtain and shoddy workmanship with regards to painting and sealing
Positive_Review: The reception areas were of a good standard and the staff were very friendly and accommodating

Negative_Review: Parking at 25 overnight seemed very steep indeed After all the room prices are not cheap While breakfast in the hotel was expensive The Muffin Man tea shop nearby provided a more reasonably priced and aesthetically pleasing alternative
Positive_Review: This hotel is brilliantly located in a little backwater just off Kensington High Street Only a short walk from the local tube station Central Line the bright lights of London s West End are minutes away The room was fine and the bed very comfortable firm and flat if you know what I mean Room service was good and the menu reasonably priced while there was a good atmosphere in the bar and satisfying choice in the restaurants downstairs The staff were friendly and welcoming especially at the front desk where we were even given complimentary wi fi for our stay

Negative_Review: The tea and coffee served at breakfast was very poor I am not a big breakfast eater so a good beverage is what I am looking forward to The noise from next door guest snoring did keep me awake As did his alarms phone calls sneezing etc Apart from this the room was good
Positive_Review: Rooms were functioned well with a safe fridge and air conditioning Superior room was a good size

Negative_Review: High price of food drinks
Positive_Review: Great location fab helpful friendly staff had a couple of issues with room facilities delt with immediately Very expensive for food and drinks breakfast 17 Diet Coke 3 50 did not use those facilities fab local restaurants with 3 course options st really good value can recommend the Thai and Italian restaurants

Negative_Review: Uncomfortable foam pillows pretty ordinary breakfast bad coffee no extra little comforts in the room not even a branded pen and notepad tatty old bathroom when did you last see a plug and chain in a four star hotel The standard of accommodation in this place doesn t even come close to the image it markets once you ve left the downstairs lounge and bar areas I d seriously consider staying somewhere else if you want a nice room for your money
Positive_Review: Helpful staff

Negative_Review: Originally booked a double room for myself and my wife for our anniversary On check in was told it was a twin Told someone would come up and Zip the beds together Room was slightly tired No one came and sorted bed Went out for dinner On return still nothing had been done Next morning I went and complained and we were then changed to another room which was acceptable
Positive_Review: Good location Staff happy to help

Negative_Review: I didn t like the dirty room and bathroom it smelled didn t like the train noise didn t like the fan in room noisy
Positive_Review: the staff and the restaurant

Negative_Review: Nothing really we have stayed here onseveral times over the years and the rooms superior are spacious for London hotels It s also a two minute walk from the tube station In other words a good hotel to visit London
Positive_Review: Location and value for money

Negative_Review: We have been charged twice for the first two days we stayed at the hotel The problem is still pending with no response from the hotel so far
Positive_Review: The Location of the property

Negative_Review: Nothing other than at reception it would be good to tell people about using their room cards for the lift it is surprising how many people don t realise
Positive_Review: Lovely room spacious and very comfortable

Negative_Review: The towels were grey not white as they should have been
Positive_Review: The hotel overall is very good value for money and is in an excellent location close to Royal Albert Hall and Kensington High Street

Negative_Review: overlooked the tube line so a bit noisy room very tired and could do with a refresh lock on door didn t close properly not great for a single female traveller
Positive_Review: very professional and friendly reception staff nice follow up call after i checked in to enquire how everything was Good communication between reception and housekeeping to solve a problem with the room on check in

Negative_Review: Not applicable see above
Positive_Review: Everything was excellent from when I booked in including excellent room service and breakfast was well worth the price I paid all staff I interacted with were very profesdional and friendly

Negative_Review: Nothing really it was a very good stay
Positive_Review: We wanted a day room because my wife is disabled and we were coming to London for lunch and a concert The staff were very helpful having disabled parking available was a real plus It was just what we needed a space of our own to rest up in

Negative_Review: Towels could have been softer Access to stairs was difficult when the lifts were busy
Positive_Review: Room excellent toiletries good All staff very helpful from housekeeping reception and waitress even though the hotel was extremely busy nothing was too much trouble

Negative_Review: Receptionservice took to long time Housekeeping did not answer The elevators did not work properly There were kews everywhere and long kews for breakfast
Positive_Review: The room was ok

Negative_Review: The reception is almost always understaffed I had to wait for 10 minutes to be served even though there was only one guest before me Wifi was unstable
Positive_Review: Conveniently located within 3 minute walk from a tube station The room and bathroom was larger than some other hotels in the similar price range

Negative_Review: the queue for breakfast was a challenge Take the option of Executive Club to avoid this
Positive_Review: the rooms were comfortable it was so easy to get everywhere Poonam checked me in and she was wonderful facilitating a great start to a wonderful stay I would return for sure

Negative_Review: The room we stayed in was a bit tired and not up to standard of a four star hotel
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a great location most of the staff were helpful and freindly

Negative_Review: No negatives at all
Positive_Review: The location was fantastic close to Kensington High Street and the tube station For a big and very busy hotel we found the staff particularly friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Bookingwith book com They did not keep the price quarantee when I found it cheaper elsewhere with 10 mins of making the booking booking com lied and told me that the payment had already been taken when in fact it wasnt taken until I checked out
Positive_Review: THe hotel

Negative_Review: I had to insist on a room with drawers For some unknown reason management have removed the drawers from some rooms and there is nowhere apart from the wardrobe to put sweaters underwear etc etc
Positive_Review: Location of hotel Friendly staff spacious room

Negative_Review: Basin plug broken so wouldn t drain NO breakfast tea or biscuits in room Keycards mis programmed at check in More reception staff needed
Positive_Review: Rooms were quiet and clean Small shop in lobby for coffee etc Convenient for parking

Negative_Review: poor service by reception did not record that we had ordered breakfast or morning newspapers did not record that we had recorded a credit card for extra items whilst on our stay this caused embarrisment with bar staff who insisted that we had to pay as we went along this was resolved but should not have been necessary also room maid cleaned room whilst we were at breakfast and had not put sign out to clean room also took ages to prepare decafinated coffee at breakfast and also took ages to serve irish coffee after evening meal all small things but as they say many mole hills turn into mountains
Positive_Review: the rooms wee comforable and breakfast excellant

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Terrific location for nights out in Soho football at Chelsea and access to the train to Gatwick 24 hour McDonald s to provide drunken sustenance

Negative_Review: Alittle far from some things for walking But taxi s were available and tube or bus once we figured them out
Positive_Review: Loved having coffee pot in the room Wonderful breakfasts with large variety to choose from Staff always helpful Wonderful experience

Negative_Review: at first impressions the exterior of the building was a bit off putting but once inside everything was spot on will definitely be back
Positive_Review: very comfortable room at a fair price no complaints at all thanks very much

Negative_Review: We are booking in booking com and when we are check in we wait at least 30minutes because staff said is something mistake they didn t get my booking So I need to re book again and re pay again Whole process they didn t say anything like sorry and we have a car and we already register when we check in but when we check out the staff s computer didn t show out that we are register And we need to register again So ridiculous all the thing and it is 4 stars hotel sad
Positive_Review: Only thing I like is room service

Negative_Review: Rooms look v worn Maintenance could be better Couldn t open window because of height of building so had to run air con heater unit all night and was still too hot
Positive_Review: Was good value for what I paid but certainly wouldn t have paid more Copthorne at Chelsea FC is a far better hotel

Negative_Review: Bed not hugely comfortable New Travelodge beds much better Very impersonal service Club room nothing special a little tatty at edges Tube line noises as was air con Fridge was so noisy I had to turn it off when it woke me at 3 in morning Breakfast not good and bar very expensive
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The breakfast buffet was limited with no options within the buffet for eggs to order or coffees Over the six days the options in the buffet changed only once which became very dull and not worth the price paid for it Given the size of the hotel and number of guests it hosted there was no element of a personal touch
Positive_Review: The location of the property is very good It is a 5 8 minute walk to the tube station depending on walking speed The tube station surrounding bus stations and availability of Ubers in the area is also on point Within the area are also good chain restaurant options and easy access to a Food Hall Pharmacy All in all a great stay

Negative_Review: The only little down side was the size of the bathroom needed to be bigger for me and my partner That s it
Positive_Review: The room was very well set out and comfy Was upgraded to club class and we loved the style and comfort it brings would definitely come back one day Good location

Negative_Review: There was nothing we didn t like For the price we paid through Booking com this was excellent value
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and attentive particularly the Algerian French concierge whose name I sadly didn t get from greeting us politely as we arrived to immediately coming to the rescue when the keycard to our door proved faulty We had to wait twenty minutes for the issue to be resolved but were then offered a room upgrade to Club Class to compensate us for the very little inconvenience Excellent service in a hotel of 800 plus rooms where we might have felt like just another couple of guests Top marks We also loved the convenience of the location just moments away from High Street Kensington Tube

Negative_Review: The hot water sometimes ran with cold water for a long period of time The toilet didn t flush fully We have stayed here a few times before but this time wasn t as good as before
Positive_Review: We liked the location The access to taxi service was good

Negative_Review: We had to queue for fifteen minutes for a table for breakfast This would have been very inconvenient for any guests with an exacting itinerary We have never queued for breakfast in any other hotel in the world
Positive_Review: The porters were very helpful The twin room was comfortable with tea making facilities

Negative_Review: Club lounge was some times crowded and unable to use the facilities we had payed extra for
Positive_Review: Location was fine and good transport link just up the road Accepted the offer for Club Membership which was fine

Negative_Review: Main dining room was full for breakfast with a long queue We were relocated to one of the bar areas which was a good solution although it seemed a bit unfair on those left in the queue Ran out of fried eggs so had scrambled not preferred option Hotel needs to increase capacity or manage demand perhaps introduce pre booked time slots for breakfast
Positive_Review: Food was good

Negative_Review: Situation when staff is showing me where I have to sit during breakfast is quite uncomfortable I d like to choose a sit by myself
Positive_Review: Charles reception manager is absolutely fantastic man It s a treasure of this hotel Very helpful easygoing competent manager
Comfortable bed nice bathroom with bathtub room was quite spacious friendly staff Good facilities such as 24 hour room service restaurants concierge coffee bar in lobby

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had a lovely surprise on our arrival when we were told we were drawn as the guests of the day and we had received an upgrade to Club standard The Bugis Street Restaurant provided us with an excellent meal at a very reasonable price

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Loved it was close by the train station and was around a great area of town The hotel staff was friendly and was willing to help us with what we needed

Negative_Review: I resented the fact that once I got there I had to listen to a sell about upgrading and adding breakfast and upgrading my room because I just reserved a standard room I almost felt like I was wrong to reserve a standard room It was like listening to a used car salesman and I didn t like that I finally very nicely told the young woman that I trusted that she was going to place us in a room that I would be totally happy with and and wouldn t have to come back down to the desk and complain about I saw several negative complaints on the TripAdvisor site and didn t want to have to deal with a situation like that In the end we got a lovely room that was clean well appointed and very satisfactory
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Place a little bit dated maybe but that s just a personal preference Dodgy view of a lot of railway lines out the window Need to get them re located
Positive_Review: Well located nice overall experience Staff were lovely

Negative_Review: We had BOOKED and CONFIRMED afternoon tea for a birthday celebration On arrival manager could not find booking Afternoon tea was served in public bar where there were two t v on and people drinking They had no quite corner so we had to wait until table was set in the middle of room Very bad standard for 4 star hotel tea should be served in sitting room not public bar Would I stay there again Yes only for location Kathleen Nolan
Positive_Review: location close to albert hall bedrooms good towels need replacing

Negative_Review: Didnt choose to have breakfast as this seemed expensive but probably the going rate for London
Positive_Review: Location great for the Albert Hall Kensignton High st Hyde Park etc No traffic noise as tucked away

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Comfortable beds bedding staff were really friendly helpful We left our bags in free secure storage before checking in and after checking out on the last day

Negative_Review: A noisy room We had a room at the back of the hotel although eight floors up it was very noisy Presumably the air condition system
Positive_Review: Good customer service Polite and very helpful staff

Positive_Review: Good location Comfortable room Very clean Most of Staff were very pleasant and helpful

Negative_Review: Room is probably due a refurbishment but nothing else
Positive_Review: Staff were very helpful and keen to answer questions Location is excellent for walking through the parks Nearby restaurants and shopping very good

Negative_Review: Bar prices somewhat suspect one 175mi glass of house white 10 75 it may be Kensington but that was silly
Positive_Review: Club rooms lounge breakfast experience really great loved it All front desk girls beautiful totally professional

Negative_Review: Bar prices were a little excessive but friendly service nonetheless
Positive_Review: Great selection at the breakfast buffet very welcoming and friendly staff throughout Have stayed once prior to this visit and would happily do so again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: This is a great hotel very well located smart modern very good value for money and to top it all I was given an upgrade What more could you want

Negative_Review: Check in couldn t find booking although had booking com reference and took over 45 mins to rectify
Positive_Review: Breakfast was both full of choice and tasted lovely Very busy restaurant so be prepared for a wait Rooms were really clean and well proportioned for London we had superior double but didn t notice any difference from standard double Housekeeping staff lovely and friendly Location excellent for Kensington palace Royal Albert hall Knightsbridge all within a 20 40 min walk Kensington high street has good choice of bars shops and restaurants

Negative_Review: The room backed onto the underground line noisy Needs a refurb bathroom shabby with cracked floor tiles and broken fittings Furnishings a bit tired
Positive_Review: Near to an underground station

Negative_Review: For some reason hotel management have deemed it better to remove drawers from some rooms which means there is nowhere to stow belongings apart from wardrobe and small drawer beside bed When there are two of you or even one for that matter this is a real nuisance Had problem also obtaining the sort of room which I required
Positive_Review: Location excellent bed very comfy

Negative_Review: Arrived before check in time and asked if there was someplace I could change for a meeting Receptionist seemed to indicate that I could check into my room but then took ages to find my booking time I didn t have to spare Eventually she could not find my booking so I wasted time Then another receptionist tried again I explained that I had to get changed quickly She then said my booking was not in the system and I could not check in in any case Frustrating to waste time Eventually used toilets to change Dirty bathroom when I dod finally get to check in later that night missing toiletries noisy neighbours late into night very early in the morning Duty Manager did say to call any time if noisy after 10PM as they will send night security to resolve tissue box empty when I put my hand into the holder I cut my thumb quite badly Blood everywhere took ages to stop Also curtains don t keep light out Not a biggie for me just used to the dark until I choose to open the curtains or ut on a light Didn t eat in hotel or use leisure facilities so not able to comment there
Positive_Review: Location good On checking out I had some comments about why I hadn t enjoyed my stay Reception staff immediately said I should speak to Duty Manager which I did I was offered an upgrade on next visit I may not ever come back to this hotel so would have preferred a discount on the stay I did have

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location near the royal Albert Hall for our David Gilmour gig late bar which was good for after the gig and reasonable priced drinks hotel was clean and comfortable the staff were friendly and polite buffet breakfast was good would definitely stop there again great value for money plus taxi rank outside was handy

Negative_Review: Getting a bit past it Lot of corridor noise each night
Positive_Review: Price was OK and location Noise from train tracks at back wasn t too bad Large bar

Negative_Review: We didn t run into anything that we didn t like Stayed three nights and were quite happy
Positive_Review: We upgraded to a club room which was very spacious with a great view and granted access to a lounge which was nice Breakfast was good with a nice selection Staff was friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: Neither of the two bars was very inviting with staff who could not really be bothered at 10 30pm

Negative_Review: Wifi constantly didn t work key kept not working lift jumped 11 floors wife found something in her drink Not impressed

Negative_Review: No Negative

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was so central the staff were very helpful Breakfast was full of choice and very tasty The rooms were spacious We had kettle and tea coffee in room Even an iron if needed Very clean and comfy beds

Negative_Review: Room a little noisy due to train line but no major issue

Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and accommodating The room was very nice and spacious and so was the bathroom The location is perfect 2 minutes from high street Kensington tube station and high street I would definitely book here again

Negative_Review: The Breakfast was Chaotic but there was a warning that the time we attended would be busy and it was But it did not need to be as chaotic Customers were asking for butter and they were told there is butter and were given Flora Margarine and made no attempt to go and fetch butter from the servery kitchen Customers then asked managers and they fetched some pats of butter but a couple of minutes later a bowl of butter pats turn up surly butter and margarine would be on offer at any reasonable standard of resteraun This is only a minor problem and did not effect us personally
Positive_Review: The Bed was comfy The Room was clean The Key to the Room worked first time each time used We enjoyed the our two day stay

Negative_Review: The hairdryer was broken but luckily I d brought one when you lifted it up from it s holder the front end was detached leaving all the heat elements exposed Also the kettle didn t switch off meaning the button and handle became extremely hot if not caught in time other than that it was great
Positive_Review: Despite being very busy the hotel was very quiet at night meaning a good sleep was had The staff were all very friendly and helpful and the breakfast was excellent and a very good choice was available Being able to leave our bags with Guest Services before check in and after meant we were able to see and do more

Negative_Review: Overpriced bar barman was clueless about the drinks available had to show him how to make a scotch and coke and got a 1 60 service charge for my trouble Not impressed

Negative_Review: Wifi was intermittent and inconsistent speed Dial up would have been faster Sub standard

Positive_Review: Great location X comfortable room X amazingly close to underground and shops

Positive_Review: Staff were nice and helpful Beds were very comfortable Nice and quiet and good location

Negative_Review: I d booked twin as I was travelling with my 13yr old daughter by could only have a small double when I checked in Not appropriate and very uncomfortable The queue for breakfast was ridiculous

Negative_Review: Queuing for breakfast

Negative_Review: Rail line was a little noisy at the back of the hotel Wifi was a bit hit and miss but did work Breakfast can be very busy

Negative_Review: The towels smell noticed this last time also they need some conditioner when being washed The sheet on my bed while it was clean it was in poor condition No water in the rooms is very poor

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were nice Resturant had lovely food Bar was good We found this hotel in a good area to Close to train station We enjoyed our stay here Just the view in our room was trains but they never bothered us

Negative_Review: The one and only downside of the breakfast for us was the limited selection of fruit

Negative_Review: There are no adapters in the room which is extremely inconvenient especially for people traveling for business The wifi is very weak

Negative_Review: Furniture fittings bathroom and carpet were a bit tired and would benefit from modernisation
Positive_Review: Location great staff were friendly and helpful and rates are very competitive

Negative_Review: nothing can t fault a thing at this hotel
Positive_Review: Very friendly efficient staff Valeria on reception was wonderful superb location Very cheap price for central location but great hotel

Negative_Review: Being woken at 1am by housekeeping letting themselves into our room to deliver milk that we d asked for over an hour before and had given up on receiving
Positive_Review: Excellent location and comfortable beds

Negative_Review: We asked for fresh milk to have in tea in our room as I have often done in other hotels of this price point I was very disappointed to be told I would have to pay 3 50 for a jug of milk
Positive_Review: Very friendly check In Good range of breakfast items

Negative_Review: The cocktails menu really poor very little choice of all the hotels I have been in the world the worst Didn t require free products but if my daughter and my self did not enough shower gel etc for two
Positive_Review: Pleasant enough hotel and location to restaurants and Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: Bathroom needs modernizing
Positive_Review: Very comfortable large bed Nice room Bathroom could do with some modernizing We would return there if price was as good as this time

Negative_Review: For the second time our booking was not registered properly and had to be sorted out which was stressful and time consuming However the Duty Manager Vikramjit Singh was lovely and sorted it out albeit it made me late for my lunch date I think there may be an issue between Booking com and the hotel booking system as this is the second time this has happened
Positive_Review: Have stayed here several times before Good location good value and nice to be able to park

Negative_Review: A do not disturb sign in the room so that I could stop the maid from constantly knocking at 7 30 am each morning despite requesting she not do so and a sign to hang which never arrived More people that can speak and understand English Door keys constantly not working in the lift the Lobby seemed to be constantly cordoned off for some reason it was impossible to sit there at any point during my stay
Positive_Review: location in general the staff were very helpful and pleasant

Negative_Review: Towels were grubby only 1 mug and 1 bedside lamp in room Had prepaid but receptionist very officious with my husband when he booked in ahead of me and insisted this was not the case First night payment had been taken but wouldn t give him the room til he paid for second night
Positive_Review: Location price

Negative_Review: The hotel is a bit of a factory typical of a 4 star hotel in London but I upgraded to a Club Room and the decor bathroom etc were very disappointing not even a bathrobe or a biscuit on the tray Bed and bath were small and dated
Positive_Review: The hotel is a bit of a factory typical of a 4 star hotel in London but I upgraded to a Club Room and the decor bathroom etc were very disappointing not even a bathrobe or a biscuit on the tray Bed and bath were small and dated

Negative_Review: small rooms and the beds are not that much comfortable and the walls are not sound proof you can hear out side and some time room near by
Positive_Review: location and the staff at the breakfast Excut club were great

Negative_Review: That the hotel contacted us because they required a form filled in for the guests confirming details which already had been done They also required payment details direct to hotel Why when this had been done
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bed in my double room was two single beds pushed together Very big hotel meaning it can take a whille to get to rooms Curry in restaurant wasn t great Hotel seems to get lots of large tour groups who congregate in the lobby which can be off putting Furnishing s slightly dates
Positive_Review: Room was spacious and reasonably well furnished Tea and coffee making facilities were very good Location was very good Restaurant brasserie was nice and keenly priced especially daily deal Reception staff were very good and maid service left the room spotless Good location near tube station

Negative_Review: Wifi didn t work in the room Bathroom was dated as well as room
Positive_Review: Near whole foods and many coffee outlets Near central and district tube station

Negative_Review: Couldn t believe there were no biscuits to enjoy with our cuppa Seriously can t comment too much only slept there one night didn t even have breakfast so didn t see the facilities
Positive_Review: Pleasant staff room was clean We didn t expect any more

Negative_Review: Our bedroom was very shabby with curtains hanging down Very small and needed updating Breakfast could have been better with more fresh fruit and a better selection of cold meats and cheeses
Positive_Review: Location was good and staff amazing

Negative_Review: The bathrooms especially are a little dated very different from the lobby Room got warm and couldn t quite work the massive air con
Positive_Review: Brilliant location with easy access road tube station and a few eating places Thai place up the road was fantasia

Negative_Review: Room service menu could have been better hence had to use cafe express
Positive_Review: Location Staff Nice large rooms Clean Cafe express downstairs fantastic service and food Great coffee at cafe express

Negative_Review: Only a small matter but the light switches in the room took a bit of working out
Positive_Review: Excellent location staff were always friendly and helpfull room was clean and comfortable

Negative_Review: Hotel does look a bit outdated but then so do many London hotels
Positive_Review: Well located to the High Street and bus and train connections As well there is a good choice of restaurants within walking distance

Negative_Review: Mattress pad was stained and visible through the sheets Window curtains were stained and gritty with dust
Positive_Review: Concierge and guest services staff were helpful and pleasant

Negative_Review: Unfortunately we were in a room adjoining with a family with several young children who woke very early and quite noisy Key cards became disabled and had to visit reception to re activate in a busy check in time period
Positive_Review: Hotel with car park is a plus as we travel to London in a car on most occasions Albeit price of parking has increased over the last few years

Negative_Review: Unable to have card details added to system for some reason so cash for everything but not a major problem as I had arrived 3 hours after booking the hotel room online
Positive_Review: 3am room service outstanding complimentary drinks whilst waiting for reception to load me on the system as book online 3 hours prior

Negative_Review: Our hotel room needs a fresh coat of paint Secondly it could have been cleaner and smelled better
Positive_Review: We were two We liked the location location and location Close to High Kensington Street Station on the Circle Line We also like the facts that there are plenty of shops near by to shop and to eat The neighborhood is really pretty Take a stroll around it to discover some really beautiful properties

Negative_Review: Cold croissants and having to put bread through toaster twice to get it brown Requested a fruit basket and milk in the fridge but neither eas do e
Positive_Review: Bed was a bit past it and gave me a bad back Decor a little tired

Negative_Review: We did what the towel sign said hang up if we didn t want a daily change unfortunately they were changed daily we didn t need that
Positive_Review: Check in staff we don t know her name but she was seriously lovely

Negative_Review: The free wifi was very poor Ok in reception area but not in bedrooms The West 8 bar although there is a happy hour is still way too expensive Works out at 5 50 a pint No draught beers either Not surprised it was empty Gets very busy at reception Breakfast expensive
Positive_Review: Location is good helpful staff

Negative_Review: Very busy over Bank Holiday weekend so didn t eat breakfast in the hotel Instead went around the corner to a lovely little restaurant in the entertance to Kensington Underground and eat a beautiful breakfast for a quarter of the price
Positive_Review: Nice hotel Perfect location for sight seeing in central London due to close proximity of the Underground

Negative_Review: Nothing to find negative about this hotel
Positive_Review: My wife and I have been staying at this hotel every year for the past 10 years That should speak for itself how we rate this establishment It s great

Negative_Review: Rooms are very tired and the bathrooms really need refurbing The main problem for me was I could hear everything that the people in the next room were saying and they were just talking normally Don t know how you can get away with such thin walls Would not stay here again
Positive_Review: Good location tube is 5 mins walk The hotel has its own car park which was good for us

Negative_Review: The bed was firm We found a clump of hair on top of the bath tap before we d even used the bathroom The kettle was also half full of water when we arrived when we tipped it away we noticed it didn t smell particularly nice
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: Upgrade was no different We still received same room without upgrade Just paid for breakfast Additional fee for room service
Positive_Review: Great location for what we wanted to do

Negative_Review: Staff member who checked us in was difficult to understand told us we had been upgraded as requested I doubt we were as the room was nothing fancy She told us there would be something special in the room as it was a surprise trip for my husbands 40th but then there was nothing in the room unusual
Positive_Review: Location was excellent

Negative_Review: We had trouble with our room card operating in the elevator and had to ask other guests to press our floor number
Positive_Review: Breakfast very good with a great selection Facilities and location superb staff very friendly

Negative_Review: It s more than a little tired and in need of renovation at the money it cost I d expect better maintenance and cleanliness There are a lot of options out there and this needs a little tlc in my opinion
Positive_Review: Location staff couldn t be faulted

Negative_Review: Sound of the trains passing by Bathroom was not cleaned properly Furnishing a bit old and worn out
Positive_Review: Location location Close to the High St Kensington Station Hyde Park Notting Hill etc

Negative_Review: Having stayed here before I always ask for the NON train side of the hotel or you will hear the tube station trains until 10 pm
Positive_Review: Staff very accommodating Good central location Nice restaurant Excellent breakfast

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff in this large hotel in a quiet road Efficient service and convenient central location close to shops museums park concert halls and public transport Room comfortable with air conditioning and good beds Buffet breakfast excellent and catered for all tastes

Negative_Review: As Club customer very poor breakfast Saturday Very limited fresh fruit and when we asked for some we were told what they had orange and grapefruit was all they had On previous two days a good selection of fresh fruit was available Also waited almost 40 mins for breakfast order on Saturday Club breakfast room was crowded and staff were overwhelmed
Positive_Review: Pleasant staff

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The attention to customers in the foyer by both desk staff and floor staff It was excellent Smiles and pleasant conversation from two lovely ladies at check in So important in a hotel A most pleasant and friendly gentleman checked me out four days later The hotel is about five minutes walk from High Street Kensington Underground station The number 9 bus also stops near the station and goes right in to Aldwych really handy for theatres Room was large and spotless and it had a fridge Other hotels please note All in all a most pleasant stay thanks to staff

Negative_Review: The hotel and my room even though clean were a bit tired looking Some refurbishment would definitely help the rating I gave it
Positive_Review: Staff were excellent very friendly and very helpful The location was very good

Negative_Review: Booking com was for B B but informed on arrival no breakfast included this was only honoured only on production of printed paperwork advise you have this available
Positive_Review: Ideal location for Royal Albert Hall and Hyde Park

Negative_Review: Lifts not working properly nor fridge nor tv until I connected aerial myself Breakfast not as good quality or choice as previous visits Staff fewer and less well trained than previously
Positive_Review: Convenient Location Big busy London hotel feel

Negative_Review: This is my 3rd and definitely last stay in your hotel You have a huge internet problem had the same terrible exp with you in Nov 2015 but seems none is willing to fix it Is it normal in 2016 in one of top touristic destination in the world London for the internet to be that slow when completely inexistant All the staff acknowledged that you have this prob and the management do not seem to care about it
Positive_Review: Location welcoming staff

Negative_Review: the key card had to put in about 10 times before the bedroom door opened this happened every time which was really annoying
Positive_Review: it was very good value for money an excellent location and staff were very helpful and friendly I have stayed here before and would again

Negative_Review: Bathroom was a bit dated but clean Not noise proof but I always use earplugs so not a big problem
Positive_Review: Situation perfect for our visit Room good size for a big city hotel

Negative_Review: Disappointed after expecting the excellence of my last visit
Positive_Review: Was at Copthorne Tara last year also two rooms as with adult children Wonderful Hence my re booking and moving after four days to spend the next 14 days at another establishment nearby location What a shame You will see from my previous review my adult children and I were delighted at the hospitality on that occassion Different ambience in the main Was not writing a review but did due to constant nagging by Booking com and that is another story

Negative_Review: We were lead to believe the car park was free for guests and was shocked to find we had a charge of 25 per night Breakfast eggs were not cooked and cold Some staff at night were at the back of the hotel where our room was chatting and laughing really late at night well after midnight
Positive_Review: Very close to the tube station Nice Breakfast apart from the eggs

Negative_Review: The breakfast is below the average with very few choices The lounge has very limited snack options only biscuits and cookies The bed size is very small I stayed in a room equipped with the largest bed they have
Positive_Review: The location is good the value you get for what you pay is above London average The staff were very supportive and helpful

Negative_Review: The Internet wifi was very undependable I had to keep changing username to work Annoying took away from all the positives that the hotel had
Positive_Review: Staff very professional Very helpful

Negative_Review: The fridge did not work however as we were staying only 1 night did not report this The maid came to our room at 8am to clean There was an old hair bobble on our beside table
Positive_Review: The beds were very comfortable The staff were pleasant and helpful The location was great very close to the tube station Would stay again

Negative_Review: I can t find it
Positive_Review: For what you have to pay it is a very good value in London point of view If you are driving with a car parking fee is a bargain within London 25 a day

Negative_Review: As a solo traveller I had booked a double room for single use I got a room smaller than the other rooms on my floor The room was still very pleasant and roomy but there should be a special rate for these smaller rooms My room was on the 4th floor on the side of the Kensington High Street Underground Station The first time I heard a train go by I though it was a fast developing thunder storm However by putting the airconditioning high I did not hear the noise any more and had a very pleasant stay N B I stayed in this hotel in March and then had a bigger and quieter room and gave the hotel a Ten I must confess I had booked a Superior Plus room now just a Superior one
Positive_Review: Hotel is situated in a very pleasant residential area away from the busy Kensington High Street Rooms have big windows and are very pleasant and comfortable althouth a bit dated Very clean Good value for money

Negative_Review: The quality of the rooms and service leave a lot to be desired The mattress was very poor quality so much so that sleep was elusive The room was cold and the staff took three hours and three requests to bring new blankets Worse the staff at the front desk the next morning were not helpful in overcoming the problem it took two requests to escalate the matter to resolve it
Positive_Review: This hotel is in an excellent location very accessible to the tube and to Kensington

Negative_Review: perhaps the room could do with a make over bathroom plating on taps and plugs gone and are now rusty pillows had seen better days
Positive_Review: breakfast was spot on lots of choice and replenished very quickly staff were friendly helpful and quick to respond to your needs even to the point of guessing before you had to ask great spot for trains etc

Negative_Review: Lights in the room are confusing no light switch in the bathroom toilet didn t flush too well bed too small for two people
Positive_Review: Air conditioning was great bed comfortable location was great for the underground staff friendly great service early check in

Negative_Review: Towels were a little thin but otherwise I couldn t fault the facilities
Positive_Review: Comfortable clean hotel excellently situated near tube and buses Friendly helpful staff Will recommend it to friends

Negative_Review: I had to complain to the manager as the window and curtains in my room were filthy There was used tissue paper in the window frames Despite pointing this out to the manager when she came to my room and promised to have it cleaned the windows were semi cleaned curtains were still filthy and the dirty paper still in the window frames I do not expect to see such neglect in a 4 star hotel I ve stayed with Copthorne many times in the past and never had any complaints before This was meant to be A Club room I dread to think what the standard rooms are like in this hotel When we checked out the receptionist did not ask how our stay was which I also find unusual for a 4 star establishment I can honestly say I have stayed in b b accommodation which has been much cleaner
Positive_Review: The staff were polite and friendly

Negative_Review: Bedrooms are old and tired only very basic tv channels we asked for a west facing room on an upper floor and got an east facing room on the second floor bar prices are extortionate small beer and a glass of wine 18 15
Positive_Review: we were there for a conference which was well organised and the staff were great

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I took the Club package which was good value room was very nice clean spacious and bed was comfortable breakfast was good and all the staff we met were very friendly helpful and polite well done

Negative_Review: The room was very small considering we were upgraded we had requested twin bed but there were none available The room was very hot no air conditioning and a sign saying do not open the windows There was no walk in shower only an attachment in the bath which was not suitable for my elderly mother to use I would expect much more considering we paid 185 for the room
Positive_Review: The staff were welcoming and helpful

Negative_Review: Mattress was a little uncomfortable and hair dryer didn t work
Positive_Review: Comfortable large quiet room with good facilities Easy walking distance from a central tube station Friendly efficient staff

Negative_Review: Would have liked bigger bed on lower floor Next time would ask for king size or twin
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful to us older people Convenient location to best of London Lovely room very quiet Croissants yum Free wifi

Negative_Review: Rather noisy air conditioning unit Shower temperature control could have been better couldn t reduce temperature for colder shower Room furniture now looking somewhat tired and slightly shabby Thought it would have been better for a club class room Breakfast fruit dish disappointing tough inedible pineapple chunks and no fresh berries have experienced better quality bacon and egg
Positive_Review: Good location for our purposes Friendly and efficient staff Parking availability was good

Negative_Review: The weather I dont like those food photos you have in the lifts They are due for a change
Positive_Review: Friendly staff Maria in Restaurant always has a welcome for us as we have stayed many times since 2003 but this was our first since 2013 The breakfast is excellent and location is perfect for travelling due to easy access to underground and busses and also kensington is a city in its own right Always go to Chuchill pub and the Goat

Negative_Review: It took a long time to book in This is the second time recently that I have stayed and on both occasions the IT was apparently down The staff struggle to sort the guests out but it is not their fault The IT needs updating
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Hotel bit dated but clean not happy room was not serviced maid came 6 30pm we were getting ready go out so pointless doing then very disappointing
Positive_Review: Easy to get around

Negative_Review: Not enough staff on reception when we were checking out Luckily we spotted the quick check out box for the keys
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly especially receptionist called Ing we were upgraded because the twin room we had booked wasn t available for some reason Just as well we were mother and daughter though

Negative_Review: Wifi signal was not great in the room I didn t say anything at the time but the receptionist said they could have put a router in my room or improved it in another way so if this happens to you ask The business centre was small with outdated software I could only use an old Internet Explorer which made Gmail hard to navigate and Dropbox impossible to access Don t rely on it
Positive_Review: Friendly staff excellent room rate inclusive breakfast could be served in our room spacious rooms with fridge kettle TV iron and ironing board bars and restaurants on site 3 minutes walk to South Kensington tube

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Highly recommend booking a Club room Our room on the 11th floor had good views and the Club Lounge facilities were most enjoyable Special thanks to Liam Eason in the Club Lounge for looking after us

Negative_Review: No record of our booking and we waited 1hr 10 mins before we were able to get a room This meant we didn t have time to shower and change before going to our restaurant booking One of the rooms allocated smelled of smoke and we had to change it
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bathroom a little dated but clean and served its purpose Needed to turn the air conditioning off as very cool and noisy
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfortable Hotel is so convenient for the underground and nice Italian restaurant nearby I have stayed here before and the hotel restaurant is good if not bothered about going out Staff are so helpful The underground car park was easy to access

Negative_Review: To have in the room adapters for phone chargers Coming from other European country we had issues with the different voltage and thus different chargers It would be good to have additional information in the room as well as adapters
Positive_Review: The facilities were excellent Great quality of the breakfast Amazing view

Negative_Review: The room had 2 large beds pushed together against a wall with no space for the person against the wall to get out of bed This was only a small inconvenience
Positive_Review: Very good position and we have got to know the staff well over the years

Negative_Review: Loud trains as they go past but nothing can be done about that Found the receptionist when we checked in to be hostile and rude someone pushed in front and there were no apologies She didn t want to talk to us and wasnt particulatly bothered about us I know we are a young couple but that s no excuse to treat us worse than other people
Positive_Review: A lovely hotel clean and quiet in the evenings Breakfast was varied and everything was cooked well

Negative_Review: Facilities in room
Positive_Review: Excellent for Albert Hall and Kensington High Street tube Good value for money for central London Rooms are fairly basic but with more space than many in this kind of location

Negative_Review: Ready for a d cor refresh I think
Positive_Review: Great welcome when arriving and good value for money given the standard of hotel Fab room overlooking London rooftops

Negative_Review: Supervisor on breakfast duty very miserable and extremely Blunt with her staff Not acceptable to be telling staff off on restaurant floor and she also barked at her staff to clear tables Should learn to lead by example
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed good clean room upgraded to better room with breakfast and free drink in bar excellent value Breakfast good plenty if choice all freshly prepared and Chef constantly replenishing items Hotel in great location for tube and Kensington Gardens Reception check in staff lovely

Negative_Review: The bedrooms do not reflect the quality of the hotel Upgrading the bedrooms could easily move this hotel up into five stars As it is the downstairs areas corridors and lifts are all four star but the bedrooms are three Beds uncomfortable and quite small and bathrooms are in need of a complete overhaul Noisy air con and fridge in bedrooms did not help sleep Telephone system wires were wrapped up in tape from the join to the socket That said bedrooms were sufficient for the time we were there
Positive_Review: The hotel is absolutely beautiful downstairs and the restaurant is fantastic Food is very tasty and breakfast very enjoyable mall staff particularly restaurant staff are lovely There is a range of restaurant areas within the hotel exercise room cocktail lounge gift shop and a coffee and ice cream parlour All within the hotel complex It is very close to all major links and from Kensington high street you can catch a tube or a tour bus to explore further afield Absolutely beautiful area

Negative_Review: The beds were uncomfortable and the decor in the hotel rooms was dated and in need of updating It would have been better if the fridge in the room stocked bottled water for using in the kettle as I had to use tap water from the bathroom or buy bottled water to make tea or coffee
Positive_Review: The location was excellent The rooms were very clean and quiet and were cleaned every day

Negative_Review: Terrible rooms were not ready at 7 30pm at night check in was 3pm gave me and my guests one room to get ready in and bathroom light was not working When leaving for our restaurant reservation at 8 30pm the other two rooms still were not ready Was such a shame as hotels central but i am still trying to sort out complaint with them 5 days later The staff did not go out of their way to sort the problem just passed the buck
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Location Noise from train even the room at 10th floor that I could not sleep we have booked two rooms to be next to each other but when we checked in rooms in differnt floors Out dated furnture
Positive_Review: Staff specially concierge Good wifi

Negative_Review: The shower Really poor
Positive_Review: Loved the location Perfect for Wimbledon and trip to Harry Potter Free upgrade to club room was a winner Lovely breakfast Would definitely stay here again

Negative_Review: We paid for a superior room for 4 days later added an extra day on Monday and this was standard double and were asked if we would be changed to superior room and were told no
Positive_Review: Wifi location

Negative_Review: Poor service We paid an extortionate amount for one night We had a fault with our lights in the room so after a late evening out we came back and found the lights turned themselves on throughout the night When we complained in the morning they said that they we should have told them in the middle of the night who wants a maintenance man or to move rooms at 4am and that they could do nothing for us A budget hotel anywhere in the world would not have lights turning on in the middle of the night let alone a highly rated hotel in Kensington Not happy Worst sleep I ve ever had The room itself was very basic
Positive_Review: Not much

Negative_Review: Cocktail lounge bar is poor Seats not comfortable and lacked atmosphere Man behind the bar had no personality and was a stark contrast to the other staff Wouldn t be somewhere I would want to sit for long and therefore they could be losing custom
Positive_Review: Excellent service from reception and dining staff Great location easy walking distance from tube with easy access from London Heathrow M4

Negative_Review: Upgraded to a club room double Only one dressing gown and one pair of slippers No water just large bottle with hardly any in it Obviously from previous occupants
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The queue to check in resulted in a 10 minute wait before being able to collect my room key Five members of staff were dealing with guests at reception so maybe I was just unlucky
Positive_Review: The double room was very clean and comfortable and there was free wifi Air conditioning heating control was a bonus and very welcome on the warm night I stayed Breakfast buffet was very good Staff were friendly and efficient

Negative_Review: Could be clearer on what was included in the booking We were told the Wi Fi needed to be paid for and were then told it was included
Positive_Review: Good location friendly and welcoming staff Very busy hotel and very cosmopolitan Very reasonable value of a central London hotel

Negative_Review: I was given an easy access room after there was some confusion over my booking my name was on the booking form that reception had asked me to sign however it also contained someone else s address I m a restless sleeper which meant I constantly woke up to find I d almost set off the alarm to call for help as our room was set up for easy access I don t require easy access We also had a room adjoining ours and later in the evening we discovered that this door was unlocked which meant anybody in the room next door could have entered our room at any time Housekeeping was sent to rectify this late that evening but we were very uncomfortable that we had unknowingly left our room that day with it being easily accessible to others The staff at breakfast were a little too hasty to remove our plates before we had finished it made us feel like we were rushed and being constantly monitored just so they could take our plates away
Positive_Review: I liked how diverse the breakfast choice was and the facilities were great Staff were friendly and the hotel is very close to the main high street and tube station for South Kensington There are also shops and eateries within the hotel in addition to us being given access to the club members room not sure why where we were given the opportunity to go and have canopies and drinks that evening They have a luggage holding area that was great for us as check out was hours before we were due to leave

Negative_Review: the booking process could have been better on arrival I asked if I could pay with a different carsd as the payment hadn t been taken but they were moving me around between reception reservations and b com that it exhaust me to the core so my initial experience was unsatisfactory and as I was on a holiday I didn t want it to start like this in my experience the reservations team had the tools to make this easier for me and to make me happy but they decided not to speak to me on the phone not to make the payment with a different card and instead they told me to call b com as they couldn t be bothered was quite upsetting Happy with the reception team as they have to face the issues while the reservations team can t even answer the phone what a shame
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The pillows were a little hard
Positive_Review: We were guest of the day which was a delightful surprise The complimentary breakfast newspaper cocktails and canap s were a big treat

Negative_Review: Stained seating in bedroom lifts requiring key card to operate fridge in bedroom was noisy throughout night Check in staff difficult to understand
Positive_Review: Location for The Albert Hall and Kensington Staff in bar very courteous Shower powerful

Negative_Review: 4 star rated hotel Has not even got the quality of a 3 star Rude staff I arrived at 12 30 and had to wait till 3pm The receptionist told me that I can upgrade you to another room for 30 pounds a night and I only wanna do this is because I am in a good mood today Very unprofessional Bed was so uncomfortable I still have back pain from sleeping there for 5 nights Carpets are old The facility is absolutely different to the pictures advertised I really regret staying there and I paid 930 Australian dollars
Positive_Review: Just the walking distance to the metro station Nothing else unfortunately

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Internet didn t work in the room location is amazing breakfast was really good staff seemed a bit confused on booking procedure but overall we had a good stay

Negative_Review: Getting the room serviced was a problem also we came back to find that cleaning staff had left our room unattended and insecure This was reported at 5 pm nothing was done we had to request a toilet roll and also milk at 10pm The next day we returned in the afternoon to find that our room was not cleaned despite our hanging the please clean our room card on the door this was again reported this time to the duty manager who promised to look into it he also bought us a drink in the bar This was very sad as we have stayed here before without incident
Positive_Review: The room it s self was of a good size with a fabulous view over London

Negative_Review: First room had no chain Second room was quite rundown poorly appointed nasty upholstered chairs Towels smelled strange twice Refrigerator was unplugged and smelled
Positive_Review: Location Price

Negative_Review: It did take four phone calls to order room service which was frustrating but it did come quickly once the order was finally made
Positive_Review: Decent view from our room great value and room service was very good

Negative_Review: The bathroom wasn t what we expected for a 4 star hotel The walls were very thin so we were woken up by next door in the morning
Positive_Review: Close to the tube station and in a nice area The room had a fridge and the staff were friendly

Negative_Review: Room hadn t been cleaned completely as the customer comments card had previously been filled in offensively The previous occupants had been smoking and we advised reception of this when they made their courtesy call It would have been nice to have been offered a different room
Positive_Review: Breakfast was fantastic and worth the advanced price Location for the Royal Albert Hall is excellent Worried that our room may be noisy as first room through lobby doors and backs onto railway but the room was well sound insulated and we slept well Would stay again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We queued for a short while to book in as a coach party had arrived at the same time As we were queuing we were provided with cold drinks a nice touch I have stayed a number of times and staff always advise when hotel is busythe best times to go for breakfast to avoid a queue

Negative_Review: Problems with door entry cards Shower did not work in one room and took ages to get hot water in another Unlocked interconnecting door to a stranger which was not resolved as requested which was not at all satisfactory Light switches confusing
Positive_Review: Convenient for arranged meetings

Negative_Review: Smiling staff at the front desk Place is a Little run down in need of a paint job Lifts were useless
Positive_Review: Close to the tube station and shops Comfortable beds with lots of light

Negative_Review: we were asked if we would like to upgrade to a superior room which we did but when we went to the room i certinally didn t feel it was one
Positive_Review: the staff and the breakfast even when busy

Negative_Review: A few more seats in the lobby lounge would have been helpful but not really a problem
Positive_Review: Staff very polite and helpful Concierge got theatre tickets for us Breakfast was lovely good selection and nice staff

Negative_Review: we had to wait longer untill we got our rooms even thought we informed before a week from our return back to the hotel that we will be back and require the same rooms which have been previously confirmed They took an extra charge on the credit even through I informed several times that the credit should be open They never took any charge when I visited the prior week not even at the other hotel branch in another area in uk Delay in cleaning rooms too Not our best experience in copthorne Tara this time
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Air conditioning in the bedroom didn t work very well at lower fan speeds to keep fan noise down in terms of keeping the room cool especially at night in fact we were both too hot Top speed is OK at keeping the room cool but that s too noisy at night time Make sure you check the options offered on booking breakfast etc and available at check in there are various upgrade offers at reception but verify they work out cheaper for you if you want one We did take an upgrade to a superior room and not for the room per se but because it included breakfast at a cheaper price than stated on my booking which in turn was substantially cheaper than the standard breakfast charge of 17 plus a drink each at the bar

Positive_Review: Good service The Sunday Times we ordered arrived outside the bedroom door with half missing However one phone call to Reception and someone appeared with a new one in its entirety

Negative_Review: Furniture old but kinda maintained nicely Bed when I first laid eyes on it I felt so grateful I came with my own traveling bedding set Beddings were awful obviously out dated pillows didn t match in size filling at all I mean there were four of them you would assume them to be a couple of sets but no No sets Just four randomly picked pillows Rug ugly by all means really Amp tired spotted in some sides Other sides seemed to look cleaner Curtains room was too bright at day even when curtains were all down Was bad Windows can t be opened Thanks god we booked two separate rooms otherwise we d be long dead lacking oxygen as we stayed for a week Bathroom no way that was a 4 bathroom Unbelievable Too bad curtain wasn t clean and ugly the whole design was poor actually toilet too old and wasn t clean even when house keeping came toilet was still not clean enough there was a yellow spot that was too strong and disgusting they managed to make it lighter but was still there flooring reacted against water It grew rust I mean it s a wc how could that be Amp I did not like the toiletries didnt enjoy the smell of the products slippers came under request what an old style of sinks and showers Walls paper thin I heard every single phone call my neighbor had he wasnt even shouting I heard him going to the toilet talking to himself I heard the house keeping everybody passing by I heard everything Location noisy At least the side I stayed at I learned to ignore the noise coming from the subway Which was actually my view The highstreet Kensington station is on the district line Nothing s interesting on the district line you ll keep on changing trains its not great but not the worst thing to me
Positive_Review: Staff perfect staff as a matter of fact we ve caused ourselves an issue regarding the reservation but with this team problem was solved with a lovely tendtender smile and patience Just great staff really Ac was good enough Could be stronger but good enough I slept nicely If only the openings were not interrupted by the hems of the curtain I used books to keep the curtain away and against the window Shower what I appreciated about the shower is the nice warm water flowing everytime in good force Iron it is there inside the wardrobe you dont have to even ask for it or send your clothes to the laundry even if they were clean like what happens at other hotels just to have them ironed Your iron is simply at reach Bed all I can say here is mattress was comfortable Lobby was good Location there are some cafes and mini restaurants in walking distance Boots too Vodafone three store It is always good to have some stores close by Not so many tho Just enough to help yourself incase of whatever Amp ofcourse highstreet kensington station is very close we walked to it daily Very short walk Amp one of the nice stations Price was the best available

Negative_Review: Cocktail bar could play different music to appeal to a wider audience Lots of mature people in there Maybe a piano in the corner

Negative_Review: This is a huge hotel and there are many tour groups staying The reception and guest service desk concierge are understaffed I had to wait for 10 minutes to check in and another 10 minutes to collect my suitcase I left at the guest service although there was no queue When a large group of guests arrives waiting time will be extraordinary They charged 40 in addition to the room charge on my credit card without telling me I know some hotels request pre authorisation for a certain amount to cover additional charges during the stay but normally they tell me before doing so Charging customers credit card without notifying them is not a good idea They didn t give me a invoice receipt at the check out I assumed they would email me as some of the hotels recently do again they normally ask if I want a receipt emailed or in paper However I was later on told when I called the hotel to enquire about the unknown credit card charge that they wouldn t email a receipt unless I specifically request it That means they wouldn t give you a receipt unless you ask which is unusual and rude Their complementary wifi was slow and you will possibly have to pay for a faster connection if you would like to do some work or watch online video The room didn t have an available socket around the desk or bed so I had to work on my laptop on the TV stand which was inconvenient
Positive_Review: Good location 3 minute walk from the High Street Kensington station The bathroom had a bathtub It was clean and the shower had a good pressure of water Free wifi
