Positive_Review: The view from floor 12 was excellent We enjoyed the food both at breakfast and in the evening The shower was good but would have preferred a walk in shower rather than over the bath The staff were extremely helpful

Negative_Review: No negative points
Positive_Review: The room 644 was excellent and all the staff were very good I left some purchased goods in a drawer in the room and the follow up has been first class goods now in the lost property department Kevin has been most helpful as have housekeeping and will be collected by a friend in the next few days I am most grateful to all concerned

Negative_Review: The room was stuffy although the air conditioning worked well the air was stale The room decor was a bit tired had the feel of having been refurbished with 1970 s materials Irritating and inconvenient that we couldn t switch lights on off without getting out of bed
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and helpful Good sized room

Negative_Review: Rooms very small so suggest nothing smaller than a Club Room worth paying the extra WIFI is terrible Very busy hotel so not personal service you are just a number Bit dated
Positive_Review: Location close to transport and attractions Felt safe within the area Nice shops and M S and Foodworks close by

Negative_Review: The dining area was a bit crowded at peak times particularly breakfasts
Positive_Review: The ease of access to transport and the proximity to the train buses and taxis The location was also within easy walking distance of Kensington Gardens and Palace amongst other wonderful attractions

Negative_Review: When I arrived at the hotel late Friday evening they had not been sent details of my booking from Booking com For this reason it took way too long to be checked in The room d cor was rather dated and would benefit from updating
Positive_Review: The staff were very very helpful and friendly

Negative_Review: The bed was very soft and the wi fi didn t work most of the time The Concierges were very friendly while some of the reception staff seemed stressed out
Positive_Review: The Location was amazing and we had a nice calm room There was a lot goin on in the Hotel Lobby but there was no noise during night time on the floors it was nice that we had a fridge as well as a hairdryer in the room

Negative_Review: Thought the breakfast at 17 a head was a little steep Decided to eat breakfast elsewhere
Positive_Review: Nice sized bed but I did suffer a little with back ache Rooms very quiet

Negative_Review: Nothing Seriously i have thought for few minutes still nothing
Positive_Review: Everything The entrance was extra grand Parking is extra close by The staff was extra friendly and super helpful The view in the club rooms is extra nice The bed linen is super comfy the pillows I could keep on and on The bacon is extra good The Breakfast in club lounge is worth coming here and made me think the room comes as a free extra to it so deserves an extra merit Unlike many nowadays this Hotel is not understaffed and even at rush hour times they coped with our large group and exceeded my not so humble expectations I have stayed in other 4 star hotels in London this one is number one and is worth every penny The glitch with the wifi was solved in minutes and only revealed how quickly the Hotel handles any problems Do not hesitate a real 10

Negative_Review: Short curtains meant sunlight flooded into the room right at eye level from 5 00am Also the bed was soft and bouncy making it difficult not to disturb each other
Positive_Review: Handy for Kensington High Street

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: View cleanliness of the room quiet my room was at the end of the corridor Was a little apprehensive after reading a few negative reviews but my room was lovely Excellent location for Albert Hall gig and close to tube station

Negative_Review: Scrambled egg was hey runny on two occasions in the executive lounge It was inedible Some train noise but it didn t keep me awake Fridge in room not working on arrival but fixed very quickly after we reported it Overall a great stay We would book again
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff and a great location Very clean public areas and great breakfast Paid to upgrade to have breakfast which included a club room with great views Air con was a blessing as was the fridge for our drinks

Negative_Review: We were originally given a room on the 1st floor at the end of a corridor It was noisy sounded like construction work next door The shower didn t work didn t switch from bath to shower We were changed to a room on the 8th floor I would be upset if I d paid more for this room as it was very similar to the one on the 1st floor In summary very disappointed with the stay The lady on reception didn t seem to appreciate why I was so upset and very reluctantly went to ask a manager for help It was a special treat weekend for us but it was spoiled by our experience at the Copthorne Tara
Positive_Review: Location parking good

Negative_Review: Old hotel a bit run down Customer service ok although unfriendly Any time you would ask for something it looked like a major effort Target for very large tourist groups
Positive_Review: Quite even if very central Perfect location for a brief visit only few steps from T in a nice neighbor hood

Negative_Review: Our room on the 2nd floor was overlooking the railway tracks ask for a quiet room to the other side Hotel needs refurbishment You can see it from the facade going through the entrance door the corridor and in the room it s all a bit shabby
Positive_Review: Great location in Kensington room has all you need and the service is okay

Negative_Review: We found the railway a little noisy but the hotel quiet
Positive_Review: The room was very comfortable and very good value I was an exhibitor at the Kensington Dollshouse Fair in the Town hall so this was the perfect location

Negative_Review: It wasn t very clean and the internet was very slow Also the double bed was also made from 2 single beds united
Positive_Review: The room was quite big the location is good and the staff very friendly

Negative_Review: Room not serviced properly before we arrived and when rectified some litter from bin left on floor Plastic shower curtains Uncomfortable bed Poor breakfast choice with hot items lukewarm at best
Positive_Review: Pleasant staff

Negative_Review: Although there was plenty of it the full English breakfast was disappointing as very bland and tasteless
Positive_Review: the bed was really comfortable and the shower was excellent although the bathroom could do with a revamp

Negative_Review: See above
Positive_Review: I could never maintain my wifi connection Maddening Asked for help at the front desk She made a call they were busy so I was instructed to keep calling back Really For this I paid my hard earned money

Negative_Review: Room was comfortable and clean although it looked a little antiquated Could do with a bit of modernising with regards to the furniture Ditch the floral patterns
Positive_Review: Very good location friendly and helpful staff attractive lobby and bar

Negative_Review: There was a very old fashioned cooling unit I wouldn t even describe it as air conditioning that was totally ineffective at cooling the room down The room was unbearably hot overnight and we couldn t open a window No shampoo or conditioner provided
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The coffee and milk are very cheap in the rooms and couple biscuits is always nice on arrival after travelling
Positive_Review: The staff are so friendly and helpful beds really comfortable great views across the city great local amenities

Negative_Review: The bed was very hard and the door was not sound proof at all you could hear everything going on in the hall The fridge in the room made such a racket that we had to switch it off to have any chance of sleep The noise from the Underground that passes right by the hotel was also a bit annoying The room was superficially clean but we found hairs in the bath shower when we arrived and when we wetted a flannel and wiped the bathroom door and handle quite a bit of dirt came off
Positive_Review: Upgraded to a club room which included a breakfast that was excellent The location was good but unfortunately High Street Kensington station was closed that weekend so it was a long walk to the nearest Underground

Negative_Review: District Circle lines didn t have service between Earl s Court and Edgware Road So I had to take a bus to High St Kensington When I left the hotel I walked to Gloucester Road
Positive_Review: A very clean room a very comfortable bed good wifi connection nothing to complain The reception staff was very nice A nice Thai restaurant and a nice muffin breakfast place are just beside the hotel

Negative_Review: We had one of the rooms that wasn t renovated I thought it was okay though a little dated but my sister found it extremely ugly The first day my towel smelled like it had been left wet too long It was better on the second day so hopefully that isn t a regular thing Everything was clean otherwise
Positive_Review: The beds were very comfortable The staff was friendly The place was quite clean They had a full array of bath products much better than the very common all in one wall mounted dispenser a personal pet peeve of mine as a woman traveller It was only a few minutes walk from the Tube and bus stops and there was a very nice little chain cafe called Nero on the way to the Tube where we ate breakfast twice The Muffin Man Teahouse was also good but I m not sure I would recommend it I had the feeling that the staff wasn t treated well by the owner There was also plenty of shopping just across the street from the nearest Tube Check out was very quick If your tab is taken care of all you have to do is drop your keys in the bowl on the counter

Negative_Review: Very dirty and dated room An extra bed required the removal of most of the furniture from the room leaving us with nowhere to sit Had we known about this we would have paid more and booked a different hotel I even telephone before I booked to make sure a third bed was no problem and to explain the importance of this The extra bed did not even fit in the room after the removal of furniture and left nowhere to walk safely Slightly larger rooms are available on the top floor but one of these was not used There were no dressing gowns or slippers as advertised the shower was broken etc etc etc I could go on The only good thing was that there was a phone and so we could call down for the repairman The hotel just wasn t up to scratch I travel a lot for work and I have stayed in far far better Premier and Jury s Inns It spoilt what was supposed to be and was otherwise a very special treat for a young boy s birthday as well as his first stay in London We were told that a gift would be left in the room which I thought was a nice touch but this never materialised The Club Room which we paid extra for was too full for our breakfast and so we were made to join the end of a very long queue in the main lounge until we complained When I asked about these things the receptionist pretended to go a speak to a manager but I believe this was a way of getting me to go away Never again and I shall think very carefully when I book any other hotel in London if I bother at all If anyone does book go with very very low expectations
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent

Negative_Review: Was unable to open a window to let fresh air in So a stagnant shower curtain didn t help the aroma in the room
Positive_Review: Olga on reception was very helpful and friendly They did not have a double bed for me so suggested having the twin beds zipped together

Negative_Review: EMPTY FRIDGE OLD HOTEL OLD FURNITURE CHAIN ON THE DOOR INSTEAD OF LOCKING SYSTEM NO EUROPEAN SOCKETS AND HOTEL DON T GIVE ADAPTORS YOU SHOULD BUY
Positive_Review: GOOD PRICE IN THE CENTER OF LONDON GOOD BED AND PILLOWS CLEAN ROOM

Negative_Review: Could not find any fault with this hotel
Positive_Review: The whole experience was a pleasure we will be using this hotel again in the near future for another weekend break

Negative_Review: Been told room not available till 1600 hrs then told can upgrade you for a extra 70 which I said yes too after been on road for 5 hours you just want to settle in Poor wifi bed never a double Went to club room nobody there that meant no soft drinks which was behind lock and key
Positive_Review: Location with parking

Negative_Review: Standard size bed cozy but haven t slept in a small bed like this in years most uncomfortable needs to be king size at least Or two twins perhaps better
Positive_Review: Pleased wifi was included but had struggle to retrieve it the second day Lifts were efficient and always one free Service at reception and client services was excellent

Negative_Review: The fridge doesn t get very cold and a little noisy Also the wall between the rooms are very thin so you can hear the next door Having said that these things happen in many hotels anyway
Positive_Review: Excellent location and such a great value for money It is a perfectly good and comfortable hotel as long as you know that it s going to be a standard level 3 star hotel Useful to have a small fridge in the room I quite like the Bugis Street restaurant

Negative_Review: Fortunately we brought our own pillows yours I m afraid are extremely hard The bed was firm which suits me The sink tap was loose but did not cause a problem The shower had a week flow but did the job The bathroom power point for shavers etc did not work I overcame this by my own two pin adaptor where I could power up my tooth brush
Positive_Review: Generally speaking there was a vast improvement The last time visited was disappointed as a good number of guests appeared to be immigrants emergency accomodation This time however everything was okay The staff I found were exceptional The food was excellent in the Brasserie as also the Breakfast

Negative_Review: Very large cockroach found walking across our toiletries in bathroom Possibly due to the plant in the bathroom Rooms could do with upgrading
Positive_Review: Comfortable beds

Negative_Review: We were there with a large group who were in the bar in the evening The staff refused to turn off the piped music despite numerous requests
Positive_Review: Room OK beds comfortable room and bathroom clean

Negative_Review: The bed was a full We had an upgraded room and were very surprised about that The breakfast was awful It was the same every day The cooked food was terrible We ate in the pub one day My sandwich had avocado that was hard We were not impressed with the food at all
Positive_Review: The view from our room was very nice I had asked to not be by the train side but did see the train It did not bother us We liked the fact that we were close to High Street Kensington and shops

Negative_Review: Always queues for breakfast however the staff try to accommodate as quickly as they can Lifts are amusing we spent 10 minutes going up and down as people kept pushing the buttons
Positive_Review: Returning guests easy to park clean central we will be back

Negative_Review: Room requires updating wallpaper was patched up with cut outs Bathroom door woodwork dirty wall covering made up of two different shades of sheeting
Positive_Review: Location close to underground staff were friendly helpful

Negative_Review: Old fashioned hotel design poor continental breakfast poor services and unprofessional employees not all but most of them Not worthy of 4 stars
Positive_Review: Good location close to Kensington Park and conference centre good restaurants in the neighbourhood

Negative_Review: We were with a large party of musicians who wanted to play in the bar after the award ceremony at the Albert Hall We couldn t get them to turn the music off in the bar so we could have a session Added to which it was nigh on impossible to get served You ve hosted this group before You should be aware of the requirements
Positive_Review: Maria at breakfast She was friendly and helpful

Negative_Review: The fact that I ordered a double bed and ended up with two singles The price The cost of a glass of wine 12 50 outrageous The heat in my room when I arrived stifling The fact that a curtain rail fell out the wall
Positive_Review: Not a lot

Negative_Review: Club lounge a bit pokey
Positive_Review: Brilliant location close to tube station and lovely eating establishment called Muffins about a minute away Will definitely go back again

Negative_Review: Room uncomfortable bed hard and duvet thin Next to noisy tube line and shower not working properly No choice of TV stations
Positive_Review: nothing to commend at this hotel

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A great location just a few minutes walk from High St Kensington underground And plenty food options locally Mr Muffin Man around the corner for breakfast and lunch is great Greyhound pub on Young Street for a drink Balans Soho Society for dinner Great food and staff

Negative_Review: Our room was a bit dated but we paid a very reasonable price for a fantastic location
Positive_Review: Fabulous stay at the Copthorne amazing location Friendly staff Thank you

Negative_Review: Personally felt the drinks were over priced however this didn t stop us staying Had dinner in the hotel two nights out of three First night we didn t get starters for 45 minutes after we ordered and one of the party had to leave even though we ordered his main course to arrive with starters He had chicken
Positive_Review: Lovely staff and hotel great value One of our members ran the London Marathon and it was a great base for us to use for sightseeing etc

Negative_Review: No negative comments to make
Positive_Review: Thought the staff and facilities in the Loby and rooms including the sandwich bar was very good and relaxing Staff and service really good and responsive when anything was requested of them Well done Pauline

Negative_Review: Our room 782 seemed like it could do with updating Had something spilt all down one wall was faded and old but could be seen The room was exactly like a holiday inn we stayed in Scotland and that cost a lot less so we expected the room here to be more like the photos on your site
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing and hotel beautiful

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Stayed here with my mum for her Birthday We had a lovely twin room and they even included a personal touch by leaving a slice of cake with a birthday message for her definitely would stay again

Negative_Review: BEWARE The post code supplied by booking com is not only incorrect but there is a separate incorrect postcode on the directions link THE HOTEL WERE AWARE OF THIS AND WERE APOLOGETIC BUT APPEAR TO HAVE DONE NOTHING ABOUT IT
Positive_Review: Hotel was warm an the beds comfortable

Negative_Review: The hotel is rather tired and needs refurbishing When I first checked in I was given a room that hadn t been cleaned since the last people left and I had to be moved to another room
Positive_Review: Hotel is handy for anyone visiting museums or the Royal Albert Hall

Negative_Review: I was approached by some men in the evening looking for a good time in a room I think security should have stepped in
Positive_Review: We were upgraded upon request and was given a complimentary drink

Negative_Review: Bar prices were a little on the high side but we should have expected this in central London
Positive_Review: High standards of cleanliness rooms well equipped and well tastefully decorated breakfast varied and tasty Service as good as we could have asked

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Checking in and out was a breeze with very efficient and friendly reception staff We booked one room at a very competitive price and on check in were offered a room upgrade 2 bottles of water 2 cocktails and 2 breakfasts at a very agreeable price Well worth it and the Margaritas were simply to die for

Negative_Review: Front counter staff were rude and un friendly Not very welcomING
Positive_Review: Excellent location 5 min walk from high street kensington train station high St Rooms comfy

Negative_Review: There was renovation in the floor we were staying in which was disturbing I think it was better to close that floor while renovating
Positive_Review: location is fantastic The friendly staff at the executive club

Negative_Review: Drinks are very expensive 20 a day would be more reasonable for parking
Positive_Review: We had lunch in the Malaysian restaurant It was very nice and exceptional value only 6 99 for 3 courses However a glass of wine costs 12 All the staff were very helpful and polite Yes I would recommend this hotel and yesI would stay again

Negative_Review: I booked via booking com and the group reservation was a disaster We have been charged twice for 4 out of 7 rooms and now struggling to secure the refund
Positive_Review: Reception tried there best to understand my block booking but failed despite there best efforts

Negative_Review: Lack of storage space in room Previously there were 4 large drawers which seem to have been removed It was difficult enough to find storage space for just one person With 2 it would have been catastrophic Hotel should offer free wi fi and also note repeat clients preferences room wise in computer
Positive_Review: Location of hotel Comfortable bed Size of room

Negative_Review: club room very tired and not reflective of the price i paid i have stayed in this hotel many times on business and its starting to look tired other hotels locally are better quality and of similar price
Positive_Review: Location and parking Ideal for Kensington High Street and Knightsbridge

Negative_Review: Unfortunately the noise from the room next door was horrendous Group of young lads sounded like they were moving the furniture around whilst hand feeding an elephant this is at midnight
Positive_Review: night staff were very helpful we were upgraded to a quiet room immediately

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were always very helpful and always there if you needed help Also the room was very clean morning breakfast had plenty of choice We thoroughly enjoyed our stay

Negative_Review: I paid to upgrade my room to a superior double and all I appeared to get was a standard room with two single beds pushed together It also wasn t especially clean the tub chair was stained
Positive_Review: The location is great and the staff are very helpful

Negative_Review: The room was a little shabby The door handle for the bathroom was falling off and not certain when they last dusted behind the Fridge TV unit The air con was a nightmare in that it was noisy even when switched off so a good nights sleep was out of the question Would say that the overall rating for this hotel would be 3 stars and no more
Positive_Review: The hotel is situated in a quiet area just off Kensington High Street so very easy to walk to Kensington gardens Albert Hall Museums and Harrods Car parking for 78 cars underground and very reasonable price given that its London

Negative_Review: Airconditioning was broken and couldn t be fixed till after we left service at breakfast service and food in restaurants
Positive_Review: Front of house staff member Valentina was amazing with her assistance when my husband became ill

Negative_Review: The Computer system was down at arrival and so booking in took an hour However these things happen Booking out took only a minute
Positive_Review: The staff are extremely pleasant and very helpful We went Club and this gave us a free bar for two hours in the evening and the Club Room for breakfast Recommended Look out for special offers that include Club Class

Negative_Review: we agreed to have a connecting room but because there was a connecting door there was no verbal privacy which was embarassing
Positive_Review: location and friendliness of reception staff

Negative_Review: not disability friendly no sockets at desk height for mobiles tablets and laptops Only available sockets were on skirting boards 1 under desk other by TV Fridge Room was noisy rail traffic outside Paid for room on arrival no option given to charge meals etc to room this meant multiple charges to my credit card for my stay
Positive_Review: Location was excellent food was good

Negative_Review: No veggie sausages at breakfast but still toast pastries
Positive_Review: Got upgraded to club room withbreakfast View from 12th floor is amazing 1 minute from underground love this location

Negative_Review: We found someone else s half used soap in the bathtub not very nice and puts in doubt the cleanliness of the bathroom
Positive_Review: The staff at the reception desk is wonderful very polite and helpful Ms Dinu received us for the check in and she was very nice

Negative_Review: Really disappointed with the room and bathroom wasn t what I expected from the pictures very dated On arrival one of the staff of reception wasn t very helpful I d booked months in advance in that time my bank card had expired so had a new one she was determined to be funny about it saying she couldn t except me without the card even if I showed her my bank statement of the payment with id Other staff were helpful though
Positive_Review: Good location with parking and easy to find

Negative_Review: The cistern in the bathroom took a long time to refill to a level where one could use it again When we wanted to order sandwiches from room service we were told it would take half an hour which as we were going out seemed rather a long time so we didn t pursue it but at least we were told how long it would take we were able to buy sandwiches cheaply at the snack bar in the foyer At breakfast the toaster in the Club Lounge seemed somewhat wonky with no automatic pop up But these were minor matters our experience at the hotel was in general highly positive
Positive_Review: We had an upgrade to a spacious well equipped room on the eleventh floor with a superb panoramic view of London we also enjoyed access to the Club Lounge where we had an ample tasty buffet breakfast This made our stay very good value for money The check in with Dina check out were prompt pleasant We liked the lively foyer the hotel shop the overall ambience of the establishment We would certainly come to the Copthorne Tara again recommend it to others

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Wonderful hotel friendly helpful staff And we are looking forward to returning in September for a longer stay than we have just had The Buggis restaurant was fantastic

Negative_Review: the room was too hot the lowest setting was 18 degrees too hot for night time and a small thing 2 tea bags per day at 100 a night why are they so mean with tea bags
Positive_Review: we got an up graded room but not sure what was different from the superior room we booked

Negative_Review: Circle line tube closed the weekend we stayed which made getting around a little inconvenient
Positive_Review: Beds were comfortable although they rolled away from the wall when sitting up in bed

Negative_Review: The concierge does not render any help to guests checking in particularly if you have luggage to take to your room Generally it is assumed that you know where your room is located so nobody directs you
Positive_Review: Clean room

Negative_Review: a little bit dusty and the bath tub is not very clean
Positive_Review: It s very big hotel with lots of bars inside and nice breakfast The room is very big cozy and nice near underground station I came back at midnight because of the opera But the block is very safe and bright

Negative_Review: The room was very small and the staff didn t really seem to know what they were doing Twice we got woken up by loud bang on on our door with room service that we didn t order Our room was also at the end of the corridor right by where all the trains drive past so it was very loud
Positive_Review: Location is perfect

Negative_Review: The decor is a little dated looks a bit tired Was able to hear neighbouring room
Positive_Review: The check in was very quick and efficient All the staff were very friendly and helpful Quite close to tube station

Negative_Review: A few more clear english and english speaking staff
Positive_Review: Excellent room Comfortable bed Delicious food with room service Extremely helpful staff All the facilities one could possibly need

Negative_Review: Our pillows were way too firm somewhat like rocks and couldn t be made less firm Made the very comfortable beds less good for a nights rest
Positive_Review: The air con worked well and was left on as we wanted Different from other hotels

Negative_Review: Booking in was rather lengthy the reception staff were confused because we had belatedly booked an extra night Breakfast was disappointing bacon was poor and you have one of those toasters that don t toast and knives that don t cut in common with most hotels in London
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Awful noise from subway and fridge noise was loud all night Worst night we ve had in any hotel we ve stayed in Would not recommend to anyone
Positive_Review: friendly staff

Negative_Review: Extremely outdated hotel Broken door and leaking toilet bowl Small bed even for asians Double bed of 140cm width to be shared with another adult Regretted choosing this hotel Do not choose breakfast as its so packed till you have to queue for it Full of tour groups
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Their was a tube line right outside my window which woke me up and I could hear each track of the train each time one passed The bed was a standard double which feels small in terms of beds these days The staff were very slow on the front desk and at the bar and many did not understand basic requests
Positive_Review: The location was great for what we needed and the bar restaurant and hotel toilets were all lovely

Negative_Review: It s very old hotel breakfast is really poor not all the stuff is nice But most of it a woman at the reception refused to call a taxi for me and insisted to take a cab outside they said it will be less expensive but in fact it s much more expensive So I had to figure it out myself fridge in the room worked like a freezer Walls are so thin you can hear alarm of your neighbors not even talking about voice or sneezing Would not recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: Location is great Very clean

Negative_Review: Arrived at 12 30 told room would not be ready until 3 pm Arrived back at hotel at 4 15 p m had to queue behind 14 people at reception to find out that room still not ready would be another 15 20 minutes not acceptable
Positive_Review: good value breakfast near tube line and bus routes Central and quiet

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The hotel has a very good ratio price quality One of the best quality is the location 1min to underground station High Street Kensington and bus stop All employees were very nice and helpful but I would like to make a special and public compliment to ING receptionist for her effort and simpathy

Negative_Review: breakfast not very hot eggs very slimy in the dish quite a good selection to choose from
Positive_Review: coffee and tea exellent requested if i could have soya milk no problems fruit good selection

Negative_Review: Unfortunately our trip was made very stressful as the rooms booked were not available We were a wedding party wanting rooms on the same floor and in various party sizes We were allocated all over the hotel and the wrong type of rooms We paid extra for accommodation we did not get and the staff seemed unconcerned The bride to be was further away from everyone making it very difficult to help her get ready and she had a very small room My son s room had a cracked toilet which he reported but nothing was done about There was lots of little things wrong which may not have seemed as bad had there been less problems with the arrangements booked
Positive_Review: comfortable beds enough dining space

Negative_Review: The person who checked us in was not at all friendly kept huffing when I answered her I finally asked her for pen paper then she sent us wrong way for lift told us we were on 2 floor when we were on the 5 th
Positive_Review: It was a nice hotel the Staff in the restaurant were excellent excellent choice of breakfast I had ordered full my husband only ever has bit toast I thought I had booked 1 full one continental but was charged for two full

Negative_Review: Breakfast was poor Luke warm tea and the pancakes could not be cut with a knife and fork
Positive_Review: The room was light and a good view from the 9 th floor There was a fridge in the room

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent and it is a good location easy to walk to hyde park harrods and museums Underground near by and short trip into centre of london

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were upgraded and our room was lovely clean comfortable and quiet We had to get assistance to find the light for the bathroom It was a switch designated bed Very convenient for the Royal Albert Hall Guest services staff very helpful too when we wanted to leave our bags for a while

Negative_Review: The double bed was 4ft 6 far to small didn t sleep well When we returned at the end of the week for a further night we has twin beds put together bliss we slept
Positive_Review: The staff were really helpful and accomadating

Negative_Review: Rooms too warm in the night had to shut off the heating put the cooling fan on 3 and throw off the duvet
Positive_Review: Check in check out speedy and super efficient Concierge very personable and helpful Spotless throughout An environment to relax in

Negative_Review: 3pm is a late check in time
Positive_Review: Very comfortable beds Spacious rooms with fridge and tea coffee facilities Attentive reception staff Convenient location

Negative_Review: Will have to fined a new hotel for the end of the year
Positive_Review: Have alway stayed in copthorne Been up to the hotel last month All changed Furniture missing Dont get chesterdraws and other things really basic told if you want extras you have to go up the tarrif

Negative_Review: The only issue I had was the bedroom was very dated and shabby looking for a hotel such as The Copthorne black stain marks on the ceiling from wall lights dirty skirting boards hems of curtains falling down etc but as only having an overnight stay as part of my daughters 21st birthday present she felt there was no need to make any issue of it but otherwise we had a very pleasant stay with alot of consideration given to your staff who I feel created a very friendly inviting comfortable atmosphere within the hotel
Positive_Review: I felt from the time we arrived at the hotel all the staff were very friendly and efficient and made our stay there very pleasant

Negative_Review: Room was over heated and minimum temperature was 16 degrees Wish we d thought to ask for a fan but we didn t
Positive_Review: Nice bath with good toiletries great food super location

Negative_Review: At check in I was offered to add breakfast for 12 50 each myself my young son so I duly paid 25 At breakfast I was told that only one of us could have breakfast I challenged this and the staff were offhand and waved me away and said OK have the buffet this was upsetting so I asked for clarification and a member of staff said he would go to reception check He came back but ignored me and I had to go to him He said I had misunderstood and that I had not paid for breakfast but a room upgrade that included one breakfast This is not how it was sold to me at check in I would not pay 25 for a mediocre buffet breakfast This was embarrassing and unpleasant I did not feel that I was dealt with properly
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: Cold coffee Breakfast somewhat hectic Object strongly to paying service charges on drinks ordered at the bar in the evening
Positive_Review: Pleasant staff generally helpful if somewhat busy

Negative_Review: The room on the 8th floor had a view of the roof of the building next to it which was a shame as I requested a room with a view of the city The towels in the bathroom had black hairs on them The room could have been bigger
Positive_Review: The location was fabulous right in the heart of Kensington clean and safe and great to walk round The breakfast that was included was delivered to our room each morning on a tray so we could wake up later and was fantastic

Negative_Review: Queuing for breakfast and tea served from a jug flask You had to find somebody to ask for a refill Furniture in bedroom was shabby Should be renewed
Positive_Review: The location was very good Room was very clean

Negative_Review: Bathrooms could do with a bit of a face lift as were a bit dated but very clean and a good hot shower
Positive_Review: The location was great for the tube network loved that the rooms had decent aircon that actually worked Nothing was too much trouble for the staff will definitely stay again

Negative_Review: The concierge was ill informed on everything and could not find a plug extension lead in four hours The night manager found one in 4 minutes
Positive_Review: Good value great location for London

Negative_Review: I wish the receptionists could have clearer accent because it took me a bit to understand what they were talking about The room was too warm The bathroom looked old tiring and miserable Towels dressing gowns and slippers were too old as well But anyway I had a nice room with a low price at a peak time so it s grateful
Positive_Review: I stayed for 4 nights just simply left in the morning and came back in the evening I didn t ask for neither breakfast nor wifi The hotel is near High Street Kensington tube station with different sorts of shops like Boots MC Donal s within 4 min of walking The room was large enough for a couple with an iron which was very handy I had room service everyday and they were very honest because I left money laptops and opened suitcases but they were at the same place when I came back

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We arrive very late the staff were very welcoming and friendly The room was very clean and beds extra comfy the best night sleep in a long time The shower was fantastic really like the nice touch of an iron and ironing board was already in the room and we didn t have to ask reception Excellent value for money in central London We will definitely stay again when visiting London

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were the customer of the day so our room was upgraded and we received a free breakfast in the club suite The room was good and the bed comfy and as we were on the 12th floor we had a good view of the London skyline

Negative_Review: Torn sheet on bed Tea and coffee not always replaced Unusable iron due to scorch mark and spilt crisps by the lift on the 6 th floor for the whole of our visit
Positive_Review: The staff responded to the problem with the iron and lack of tea promptly

Negative_Review: A little expensive
Positive_Review: Very clean great location no smoking policy throughout the hotel loads of hot water towels changed daily great variety available for breakfast overall highly recommended

Negative_Review: The room not comfortable that all i can t sleep all night Staff English not so good im not understand very well And hotel very old Im sorry to comment about your hotel it through
Positive_Review: I like breakfast that alright

Negative_Review: Noise from trains nearly constant Double size bed small as we had an upgrade Most rooms now offer king size bed as standard
Positive_Review: Upgraded to club room floor 10

Negative_Review: Hair clogged in bath plug hole Something spilt down radiator and chair stain on chair Door man had full blown argument with taxi driver making my teenage daughter very uncomfortable
Positive_Review: Staff on reception friendly

Negative_Review: I wasn t too fond of the beds They were light weight and moved very easily though quite comfortable
Positive_Review: The concierge staff were very helpful and friendly The hotel was very well located and the taxi rank outside was really convenient The tube station is another plus max 3 minute walk

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: easy access to underground and buses No problem finding our way about Good location for Museums etc Very nice eateries around Within walking distance to Kensington Park and Albert Hall

Negative_Review: WiFi slow and VERY difficult to connect to got a second passcode from the staff that didn t work either Messed up our booking no English speaking staff made this process very frustrating In our Club Room their premium room type our shower didn t work properly there was only 1 bath robe there wasn t even a bottle of water Our 17 19 year old kids ended up having to sleep in a double bed together Overall a very disappointing experience stay here if you re a business traveller on a low budget but not if you want good service AVOID if you re a family
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Pillows were very hard perhaps a pillow choice would be good More toiletries in bathroom please
Positive_Review: Reception staff very helpful At breakfast all dirty dishes were cleared very quickly which is always a plus

Negative_Review: The air conditioning sound in the room is too loud
Positive_Review: Location is advantage We arrived early in the morning and be able to left our bags at the hotel for safe keeping before check in in afternoon

Negative_Review: No double flashing and it was really windy do it kept me up in the night apart from that the hotel is really nice
Positive_Review: Room was lovely and just what you need after a day out in the rain

Negative_Review: Hairdryer didn t work in our room Forgot to mention this as we were in a hurry to get out and I had packed my own fortunately
Positive_Review: Door staff opening cab doors on arrival nice touch Check in staff very helpful we were upgraded which was fantastic Our new room was on the top floor We had a couple of issues only one towel slippers and glass when there were two of us but a quick call to reception and these issues were rectified Complimentary breakfast in club room was fantastic as were strawberries sent to our room from reception after problems were resolved Fantastic location for Royal Albert Hall would 100 stay here again Beds very comfortable D cor a bit behind the times but I kind of liked that

Negative_Review: The post code was different and it took us and several other people staying there all the way doen to Earls Court Road Website needs updating for directions
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The bathrobes were not soft therefore I found it a little uncomfortable
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to a club room which was great the upgrade came with all the added extras breakfast bathrobes slippers a bottle of water access to the club room late checkout This was great as it was my partners birthday Breakfast was delivered to our room as requested and on time and well presented it was delicious Will definitely return again

Negative_Review: I gave up waiting to check out and just left There were no staff on the check out desk and 5 different members of staff who weren t dealing with other guests including two on the reception desk ignored me and appeared to deliberately avoid eye contact
Positive_Review: Good location polite helpful member of staff checked me in

Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: Lovely polite staff Allowed me to check in early Clean facilities and in good state of repair room Good varied public areas No probes with WIFI in room warm room Useful pleasant toiletries I like to travel light Excellent situation and close to tube

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything was as we expected we were totally happy with the service and the accommodation We would definitely recommend the hotel to family and friends and if we visit London again we will book at the Copthorne Tara Hotel

Negative_Review: WiFi in room 9th floor was poor took a long time to get on line frequent drop out Room smelt slightly unpleasant probably a badly chosen air freshener Unexciting breakfast
Positive_Review: Central location

Negative_Review: Our room was just a bit too hot despite using the air con was desperate for some fresh air during the night but that was the only downside to our stay
Positive_Review: Absolutely love this hotel very nice and clean and the staff we re brilliant The little snack bar in reception is a great place to get drinks sandwiches and cakes from and really cheap It s so good that we booked another trip there already

Negative_Review: The gym was very small They could do better
Positive_Review: The staff were friendly and courteous The room was just right and comfortable warm and quiet for a London hotel The breakfast was good too as were the restaurant staff

Negative_Review: noise from trains would not stay at that end of hotel under any circumstances Bar staff need more supervision re change and receipts
Positive_Review: asian food restaurant excellent

Negative_Review: Could have more choice of TV channels on the TV Very basic considering what is available now Other people s attitude to some of the staff really no need for rudeness when they are trying to help you
Positive_Review: Although very busy the hotel was still comfortable and well run Staff very friendly and helpful The room was spacious and well decorated Always hot water available from a fabulously powerful shower and a good choice of toiletries

Negative_Review: some rooms are in desperate need of refurbishment and hate the tatty net curtains
Positive_Review: the parking ease of accessing public transport and taxi s and the friendly staff

Negative_Review: queues at check in some of the rooms are in desperate need of decoration net curtains tatty wall paper stained
Positive_Review: staff are very professional parking ease of getting a taxi

Negative_Review: Can t think of anything
Positive_Review: The room was a good size with very good amenities like a safe fridge and ironing facility The towels were just right Breakfast had a great choice and yes I like the croissants We chose it because it was quite near the Royal Opera House although we required a taxi as we felt it was a bit to far for us to walk The staff were all smiling and helpful

Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Bed comfy I appreciated getting the small items that really make a difference to a stay like body lotion as I always forget to bring mine view from 12th floor fantastic

Negative_Review: The d cor in our room particularly the bathroom was a little tired and in need of a refresh However the room was clean and comfortable
Positive_Review: All the staff we encountered were very friendly and the hotel accommodated an early check in for us which was much appreciated after a pre dawn flight We couldn t have chosen a better location it was just a few minutes from High Street Kensington and the Tube Would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: The bedroom was so hot and even with the fan we could not get it cool enough
Positive_Review: This hotel was in a great location The staff were really friendly and professional I would go as far to say they went the extra mile everyone was great

Negative_Review: Food in the bar was ok but nothing special
Positive_Review: Really enjoyed our stay here it s very central and ideally located for touring or a trip to the natural history museum or the royal Albert hall We were so thankful for the upgrade we had a beautiful room with a fantastic view of the city We will be back There is a lovely restaurant in the tube station called Billy s

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Just very comfortable All you need when travelling Clean pleasant staff We upgraded to a club room and enjoyed the extra benefits Easy walking to lots of places and close to underground

Negative_Review: Superior room was average Dividing door though locked let in noise from adjacent room Unfortunately they had children and we were woken at about 5 00 a m
Positive_Review: food and service were good at breakfast

Negative_Review: The decor is dated and the room wall pictures seriously need an update The furniture like bar fridge etc needs to be moved around so there is more space in the room The furniture needs a good lick of varnish or waxing real soon The kettle in the room was leaking and some bathroom updates are needed The bath is quite high and stepping off it is very tricky The bathroom light flickered almost throughout our stay The electrical fittings light shades had stains and one electrical conduit near the beds had the casing fallen off exposing the wires running through
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable no bad back issues The location is great and so is the buffet breakfast The staff are friendly and most are attentive The rooms are very clean especially given the age of some fixtures and fittings The bathroom is spacious and has a counter top to leave all your toiletries The rooms are cleaned everyday towels and linen changed and tea coffee products replenished I liked the shoe polishing machine in every floor The restaurants are great and the prices are pretty reasonable The little coffee shop by the entrance is great if you want to grab something on the go

Negative_Review: The room on our first night overlooked the underground and even though we were on the 12th floor we were still awoken at 5 30am Overall the rooms decor is tired and we found the cleaning standard could be higher
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and when we complained about being woken by the underground we were moved to a different room

Negative_Review: Wifi was extremely slow
Positive_Review: I like the location Close to High street Kensington and walking distance to the tube It s a very comfortable hotel that has great breakfast

Negative_Review: Nothing The hotel is well located and worked for us Kensington High St has attractive shopping and eating options and for those interested willing to walk provides easy enjoyable access to Oxford St through Hyde Park and V A Natural History Science Museum Knightsbridge via a very pleasant walk though the back streets
Positive_Review: We requested a room high up and away from the tube line noise We were initially assigned an upgraded room above the tube lie which had a broken window Result excessive noise Upon request reception moved us to a quite room which worked just fine Location is ideal for our needs and we will continue to use the hotel

Negative_Review: Rooms weren t clean with so much dusty I did not sleep Also initially we wer checked in and when we arrived to the room was a complete mess they changed us to another room
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: We asked for a quiet room but instead were given a room that 1 Had an adjoining door to the next room so we heard everything from next door 2 Overlooked the railway line 3 Was only a few rooms from the lifts We had to complain about the noise from next door on the first night and on our second night For our third night we were upgraded to a room on the top floor with no adjoining door although it was still overlooking the railway line The night staff who handled our complaint were excellent but which member of staff allocated us to one of the noisiest possible rooms after we had asked for a quiet one Or are they all this noisy We would not return to this hotel
Positive_Review: Very pleasant night staff who dealt with our complaints

Negative_Review: We booked a double but room made up as a twin No drawer space or toiletries in the room We ve stayed many times and this has never been an issue We were given an alternative room and told our luggage would be transferred whilst we were out When we returned we had to retrieve our own luggage from the original room for which fortunately our card key still worked Not the best of treatment
Positive_Review: The reception staff were very helpful in sorting out the problems we had which involved moving rooms Dino

Negative_Review: The pillows were lumpy and rather uncomfortable but the bed was very good
Positive_Review: The breakfast was very good and so were the waiting staff very efficient They asked me if I wanted another pot of tea

Negative_Review: No Internet when I arrived at 5pm and told one hour to fix it was still not working at 11pm meaning I could not work Not acceptable and total lack of correct information this is a tourist hotel at best
Positive_Review: Good location near tube

Negative_Review: Cleanliness of room dusty corners bathroom could have been cleaner Cold hot breakfasts Very busy hotel with tour groups etc Some disgruntled staff providing room service
Positive_Review: Club guests access to separate club bar with attentive and friendly Irish club bar manager who gave great service

Negative_Review: All perfect
Positive_Review: I was looked after by Olga at the Tara copthorne hotel She was fantastic Olga was very kind warm and professional She deserves recognition for her excellence I will definitely be back and have already recommended this hotel to my friends The croque monsieur in the bar was fantastic best ever

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location of this hotel is unbeatable Right in the heart of Kensington and close to the tube Price was reasonable for London Clean and comfortable room Couldn t fault it

Negative_Review: Room furnishings in superior twin are looking a little tired
Positive_Review: Fantastic breakfast Helpful attentive staff Engineer came within 10 mins to reset the air conditioning for us because it was too warm

Negative_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: The charge of the parking to guests
Positive_Review: Close to tube and shops and parking on site Great breakfast Clean and tidy throughout the hotel Staff on reception generally good but mixed advice when checking in But this is our 2nd visit here as the hotel is in a good location

Negative_Review: The rooms where a little dated and the bed wasn t to comfortable but the price we got this for we can t be to picky

Negative_Review: Cocktail bar was closed on Sunday evening The drinks in the Brasserie were expensive
Positive_Review: The beds were firm but comfortable The room was the right temperature not too hot The shower was hot and powerful The room we had was quietly situated as I had requested The location was good for the underground and local shops restaurants Happy to hold luggage at no extra cost No need to check out till 12 noon

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great value for money with parking on site and nice touches in the room like the macaroons bath robes slippers and Chinese fortune cookies as it was the Chinese new year

Negative_Review: Draughty window in my room on the 8th Floor No magnifying mirror in the bathroom Despite several lifts there is still a long wait before one arrives
Positive_Review: Really central location Perfect for my needs Very comfy bed

Negative_Review: No negatives
Positive_Review: We were guests of the day Upgraded to a suite It was fantastic especially since we ve stayed a few times over the last two years whilst accompanying our son to London for interviews He now works in Central London but we still stay at the Copthorne when visiting In addition my daughter and I shall be staying there again on 10 04 16 I hope service and stay Just as enjoyable Thank you

Negative_Review: OUR BOOKING HAD NOT BEEN TRANSFERRED ONTO THEIR SYSTEM FROM BOOKING COM AND THEREFORE IT TOOK ALMOST AN HOUR TO GET CHECKED IN

Negative_Review: The staff on reception at least the one we encountered She could hardly speak English and her manner was brusque All other members of staff were friendly The wi fi It doesn t work unless you upgrade to a more expensive room which is what they encourage you to do on arrival The breakfast Not enough fresh fruit or veggie options it seemed very expensive for what was on offer although my carnivorous husband thought it was ok Stuffy room the windows can t be opened so you have to have the air conditioning on all night

Negative_Review: Dining room packed forB fast so ordered from roomservice food was cold and had obviously been sitting around a long time scrambled eggs were rubbery some mould on underside of Bath mat I turned it upside down on the side of the bath but it wasn t changed The room was obviously in need of redecoration
Positive_Review: Location

Negative_Review: All the pillows in the bedroom were very hard making sleep difficult I asked for a softer pillow and the one that was brought was just as hard
Positive_Review: The location was great for what I required and the young doorman was very good sorry don t know his name Breakfast and the breakfast staff were excellent

Negative_Review: Didn t have breakfast in the hotel so don t know the quality If you take a short walk in the neighbourhood you ll find some local breakfast shops which is a bit cheaper if you only want coffee and a small chocolate bread roll or something like that
Positive_Review: Very close to high street Kensington tube station Nice neighbourhood Friendly staff Quite a large room for London standards Would definitely recommend it

Negative_Review: Bed was on the small side and not very comfy

Negative_Review: Coffee could be improved as it was very watery and lukewarm

Positive_Review: situated in a good area central 2 metro stops from 3 major museums south kensington Possibility to pay extra for breakfast if not included We were offered a 50 discount in breakfast which is a good deal to save some money and eat well Room was clean bathroom was not exceptional but mostly clean Staff was helpful

Negative_Review: The air conditioning in the room could be more efficient didn t cool enough and the outside air extractor was a bit noisy but overall v good

Positive_Review: bed was comfy room was clean reception staff were nice young lady in the shop by the entrance was lovely when we came back shattered

Negative_Review: The room had a musty smell

Negative_Review: I stay at this property almost every 5 6 months Everytime i check in most of the rooms arnt ready so they checked me at the 6th floor maintanance rooms which were kinda bad The power sockets at so low i have to place the coffee maker on the floor And the lights are old ones not electronic pad like the ones on 9th 10th floor Sheets needs to be changed as they are worn out Also during my last stay in januaray i used the blankets and it was so rough and old Totally not comfy I ordered room service breakfast and i got soggy fruit bowl and not so fresh pastry I love staying at this place but it needs little changes to accommodate their guests in the future
Positive_Review: Location is perfect Close to most of my interest points next to the high st kensington st Very friendly staff and very helpful Quiet atmosphere

Negative_Review: Unfortunately not keen on chinese food ordered room service of sandwich which came with coldish chips
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly Excellent breakfast Room nice and clean

Negative_Review: Not a single negative to be found

Negative_Review: the facilities and furnitures are worn out
Positive_Review: the location is great 6 7 minutes to the tube station and lots of bus station and the room is bigger than i expected

Negative_Review: Nothing

Negative_Review: Breakfast tea was grey and weak but the pot served when requested was good The menu on the table should be explained in a nicer way ie if you would like to order specially cooked food you will find the menu on the table etc Food in Bugis expensive for very basic cooking in dark room with no atmosphere
Positive_Review: Bed very comfy

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location of the hotel is great Close to our Big Bus tour location and also two nice pubs which the concierge recommended Outside the congestion zone

Negative_Review: No Negative

Positive_Review: Comfy bed

Negative_Review: The shower it was like dancing under the rain drops God forbid if you are tall

Negative_Review: When we arrived the hotel couldn t find our booking with booking com but the receptionist saw our confirmation and sorted us out a room we were lucky they hadn t sold out as it was Valentine s We also got breakfast with this room which was a bonus P
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel room cleaned every day Staff very helpful very close to the tube station walkable distance to museums but we got the tube into central London

Positive_Review: Fantastic breakfast and a really nice location near the metro and the Kensington palace

Negative_Review: It was all good
Positive_Review: Everything Great check in free cocktails stayed for a meal and had great service as a great breakfast Large clean room and comfy bed too

Negative_Review: The channels on the tv weren t being displayed properly but overall Good
Positive_Review: The bed was really comfortable it was peaceful and quite the bathroom were clean no disruptions The bed was a good size for me and my fiancee and the bedroom was also a good size for a hotel Very well done copthrone

Negative_Review: Water wasn t hot enough but I guess at prime times this is expected but I do like a hot shower Wifi was not great and costs 10 not sure I would have been impressed if I had to have paid
Positive_Review: On arrival they upgraded us for our birthdays and were chosen as guests of the day What a lovely surprise We were given top floor suite and premier lounge guests I am sure if we were just paying guests we would have been treated just as well The staff could not be more helpful and could not do enough for you attentive to your needs without asking Breakfast was delicious and always fully stocked Cocktail Bar was fab Short walk to all good shops and bars and restaurants and 5 mins walk to Kensington Roof Gardens which is amazing

Negative_Review: Expensive drinks in the Brasserie and the food took 3 minutes to arrive guess it wasn t cooked from fresh whcih is disappointing from a 4
Positive_Review: Good breakfast great rooms Useful to have food on site as it means I can hold meetings there too

Negative_Review: Nothing everything was great Looking at when we can return
Positive_Review: Early check in and an upgrade excellent location food was devine Throughly enjoyed our stay

Negative_Review: The bedrooms lacked any draw space for clothes and the rooms looked tired a long slit in the apholstery of one of the chairs wallpaper coming off the wall and veneer worn off the furniture The reception staff denied that the rooms ever had a chest of drawers incorrect to our certain knowledge as we have stayed in this hotel several times in the past and there has always been a chest of drawers Poor customer service to tell us we were wrong when we were undoubtedly correct The room was much too hot not helped by the fact that the air conditioning pumped out warm air even at its coolest setting It was cooler with the air conditioning turned off but still far too warm This is all a shame as we have always been happy with this hotel during our several stays over the last few years
Positive_Review: The location is excelllent

Negative_Review: nothing
Positive_Review: We absolutely love this hotel location is excellent rooms are very comfortable and have everything that you need will definitely be going back

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Everything s just perfect also thanks to the very good price I ve got The score will be different if I had to pay more I didn t take breakfast here there re lots of caf s nearby I love this area

Positive_Review: Good Central location near Kensington High Street and the tube

Negative_Review: Some of the reception staff spoke very poor English on arrival While my bedroom was a good size it was right over the train tracks so don t think sleep is option outside of the hours of 12 30am 5 30am when the trains stop The wi fi is also so appalling and practically useless which in this day and age is unacceptable Lets also say that it seemed a lot of guests had night time visitors so all in all find somewhere else as this hotel was not a pleasant experience from start to finish

Positive_Review: The location is excellent and near the Kensington High station with numerous buses nearby Also the hotel was of good value for the price The breakfast was very good with good service The staff at the hotel are very friendly and greet you in a positive way each day The room was roomy with good closet space drawers etc Also it was clean with adequate heat in the evening

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Lovely area close to underground Main hotel foyer was very nice We didn t eat in the hotel preferring to go out to a couple of restaurants nearby Ffiona s for evening meal fantastic Bill s for breakfast good value for money Rooms were described as Superior but were really just your average hotel room Clean comfortable but fairly basic Bathroom was small but adequate

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff very helpful Our stay was for a friends birthday and we got cake in the room which made it really special Great location We used the bar for 2 for 1 cocktails

Negative_Review: The room was very tired the bathroom especially The basin taps were loose The toilet seat was loose The air conditioning was not easy to use either too hot or cold Hard to regulate Breakfast was a bit cramped and food only adequate We have stayed in several different hotel chains all over London and this is possibly the worst as for a four star we expected better We were told this was a superior room so I hate to think what a standard room would be The view from the room was a roof
Positive_Review: The staff were welcoming

Negative_Review: Like many previous commentators we thought that breakfast needs a little attention Hot items have clearly been under the lights for some time and access to beverages needs improving A little more attention here could make a vast improvement
Positive_Review: Friendly staff made us feel genuinely welcome Very clean throughout although the rooms are clearly getting ready for a more modern makeover

Negative_Review: Shower located in a narrow bathtub a disappointing offering poor value for Club level room
Positive_Review: Have stayed at this hotel on a number of occasions excellent location close to Underground and good shopping area staff very courteous helpful

Negative_Review: Bugis Street Chinese was incredibly poor Service was terrible and the food average half hour wait at 17 00 yet booked for no one heard of theatres or the Royal Albert Hall and their opening times Go somewhere else as they don t need you at this restaurant
Positive_Review: Good vibrant hotel Room larger than most in London Not that large though Above all clean and well kept

Negative_Review: The food especially the food service the sandwiches that are served tuna chicken etc are tasteless The guest feels as though they are prepared half heartedly
Positive_Review: The staff is very friendly and helpful they go out of their way to make sure the guest is comfortable during their stay

Negative_Review: Very noisy room pipes made an awful noise Heating didn t work very draughty and walls were paper thin Got no sleep at all in room 946
Positive_Review: Good location

Negative_Review: The air conditioning in the room would not go cold enough so the room was very stuffy during our stay which was a shame However everything else was good
Positive_Review: The staff especially Olga on reception her customer service is superb and nothing was too much trouble Gold star to her

Negative_Review: The fact that I don t use a lift and requested to use the stairs this was refused so spent my time at the hotel worrying about getting in the lift
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bed mattresses are extremely uncomfortable Internet in the room was cutting every 5minutes Spent 4days asking IT reception to fix the problem but to no avail This is not acceptable from a 4 hotel
Positive_Review: Nice location

Negative_Review: The house keeping staff knock and barge into your room at the same time they don t pause to allow for unforgotten light indicator I complained but it kept happening we prebooked many months in advance but weren t told that parts of the hotel were off bounds due to RWC
Positive_Review: Our suite was fabulous Management helpful

Negative_Review: Do not use the bar and restaurant the food and service was rubbish
Positive_Review: we got upgraded to a club room so got all the extra s too The view from the bedroom window was amazing Bathrobes and slippers Brill The staff on reception and guest desk were very good

Negative_Review: Shabby bedrooms Bed too soft Noise from train track next to hotel bedrooms Price of drinks in bar with charges automatically added
Positive_Review: Reception area and bars were clean and few to choose

Negative_Review: Help desk beside reception is rude High charges for internet and other charges
Positive_Review: Hotel is in prime area and near to public transport Hotel is very nice and clean

Negative_Review: The staff at breakfast were so efficient that they kept trying to clear our plates before we had finished In the end we had to tell them to go away
Positive_Review: Good value for money in great location

Negative_Review: Rooms looked tired and needed an upgrade We paid to be upgraded on arrival but once we saw the more expensive room we decided to go back to what we had originally booked as we couldn t really see and advantage
Positive_Review: Staff were friendly and accommodating

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The location so near to the tube station and Kensington High Street Palace Gardens St Mary Abbott church The hotel looks awful on the outside but it is very nice inside

Negative_Review: Internet is expensive extremely if you book at reception Sould be free of charge as in any international hotel today
Positive_Review: Location Staff was helpful

Negative_Review: When we arrived our booking wasnt there Booking com had spelt our name wrong and so therefore they had not got our reservation They very quickly upgraded us to an executive room but only because they had one free Not sure what would have happened if they hadnt
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Breakfast experience in the Club Lounge was a let down Thankfully our unexpected upgrade from Superior to Club meant that we hadn t really paid for it in our room rate but still a disappointed Though staff quickly seated us and brought us tea they neither asked whether we had stayed before and didn t explain that it was self service It took another couple to tell us after we had sat there for 5 minutes Finally English breakfast was warm cold so definitely room for improvement
Positive_Review: Initial impressions of hotel was really good Sabrina on check in desk was polite friendly and informative Found out that we had been upgraded to a Club room from a Superior Double

Negative_Review: Other guests lack of consideration appeared to be a lot of holiday makers tourists with little thought for others who may need to get up early
Positive_Review: Good position for business travel into centre of London

Negative_Review: The curtain in the room fell The fridge froze my food and water When I reported the reception just said sorry about that

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Exceptionally good stop over for business purposes in London Near to High Street Kensington Underground Nice room and the restaurants served acceptable food in pleasant surroundings Could get busy with tourists

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Location So close to museums parks and gardens Great access to the city and theatre district by tube and bus Felt safe as I travelled alone and this is important to me Will certainly book again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We were upgraded when we arrived which was a nice surprise We enjoyed our stay and we will remember it for a long time All the staff were very helpful

Negative_Review: There was nothing we didn t like
Positive_Review: The hotel was fantastic lovely big rooms very clean bathroom very clean Breakfast was excellent everything there you could wish for

Negative_Review: Bed very uncomfortable ELVATORS broke down and was not allowed use stairs even though on 1st floor woke up every morning between 7 and 8 30 to clean roon when I had do not disturb sign on door day I was leaving checkout was at 12 staff knocked 3 times from 7 that morning it s over priced no free WiFi no bottles of water in the room these are all extra u have to pay for
Positive_Review: The location was good

Negative_Review: Room was quite cold needed the blanket from the cupboard but it was rough and one to share with twin beds was a little awkward Breakfast was of a fairly poor quality and the lifts weren t all working and with a full hotel it became very difficult to get the lift at peak times so we used the back stairs half the time which was really frustrating as the staff didn t seem to know where to point us to go when asked chambermaids Hotel needs usable stairs for when lifts aren t available
Positive_Review: Staff were mostly lovely location was great

Negative_Review: The only problem we had was we had only one cup in the room for tea coffee and there were two of use Room service failed to deliver one Twice we managed to obtain an extra one Only for it to disappear when the room was serviced

Negative_Review: The bed was very noisy squeaky and I felt the price was high given the slightly outdated room
Positive_Review: I had a Club room so the happy hour bar was appreciated

Negative_Review: The double beds were a bit narrow for total comfort and the bathroom towels were a bit rough like sandpaper Meals in general were expensive even the bar food
Positive_Review: The lady who booked us in was warm and friendly the room was good with nice decor and it felt cosy Room service was prompt and friendly and the food served was nicely presented The staff were friendly and helpful throughout the hotel There was good security without it being oppressive The room had a room safe which was great The room was clean and the bathroom was spotless The shower had a pleasant flow of warm water and toiletries were good The room lighting was good and there was a large flat screen TV There was an iron and ironing board and there was plenty of space to store clothes The room furniture looked great The air conditioning was very pleasant and the room was wonderfully quiet for a great night s sleep

Negative_Review: Room furniture is very old and looks tired Twin rooms very small even for a tiny person
Positive_Review: Location was great Very nice breakfast and helpful staff in reception

Negative_Review: We couldn t work the heating system and it was a little chilly
Positive_Review: The hotel is very clean and comfortable and staff polite Room very well appointed nice towels and furnishings

Negative_Review: Impossible to use the Wi Fi ended up using my cell phone as a modem via 4G The room though very nice was above the Underground rails The racket from the trains was hardly bearable until about 01 00 a m even though we were on Floor 11 I can only guess what it might be like on lower floors
Positive_Review: The location Friendliness of staff

Negative_Review: Didn t complain but one of the handtowels had a couple of black marks on it The fridge was a bit noisy turning on and off
Positive_Review: There was a very responsive temperature control in the room Liked the location as my friend and I use the buses when in London and the hotel is really convenient for these

Negative_Review: Security were rude and aggressive just because I wore a hoody designer Im 47 yrs old for goodness sake now I know why some teens feel persecuted Manager intervened and dalt with bolshy security guard but experience nonetheless was disappointing Sorry Tara you ve lost my business
Positive_Review: Not alot

Negative_Review: Wifi not included which is a bit mean nowadays

Negative_Review: Had an issue with a potential double booking and them not cancelling the first room Sink was a bit slow at draining
Positive_Review: Beautifully Climate Controlled Rooms Absolutely Stunning food in Restaurant Superb friendly staff

Negative_Review: The room was too hot and very small The bathroom was old and needed updating ie old dirty grout and sealant The bathroom was also not as clean as I would have liked other people hair still present in the bathroom when we arrived
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Overall this hotel is extremely tired looking The lobby and bar have been relatively well maintained but the d cor in room 248 was awful The outlook from the room was over a very grimy air conditioning system Some of the reception and concierge staff were not as helpful as they could have been Internet 10 pounds per day seriously it is 2015
Positive_Review: Obviously its very central location

Negative_Review: Staff upon arrival unable to understand the very strong accent of reception staff Room booked Superior Plus room 1st room allocated could not by any stretch of the imagination been classed as a Superior Plus Despite the window having been left open by cleaning staff prior to our arrival the room smelt The net at window was dirty and hanging off its rail The bath shower were badly stained and chipped The fridge cabinet and wardrobe were quite obviously a DIY job and very shabby The 2nd room room offered Club was an improvement and probably what we were expecting of a Superior Plus Having stayed at this same hotel in the past we were shocked to see how much it had deteriorated and wonder how it still warrants its 4 status
Positive_Review: Location easy access to tube

Negative_Review: Club twin room for one night only Reception tried to overcharge us Found dried blood on the wall in the bathroom crack down the wall windows dirty just a general tired feeling No room in Club for breakfast so moved to other room My daughter had stayed in another hotel in London recently that was cheaper cleaner and good location don t think I would stay again glad it was only one night Not the way it used to be
Positive_Review: Great location Club prices for not a club experience

Negative_Review: Nothing really
Positive_Review: This was the first time I stayed at this hotel I was really satisfied with everything I will certainly stay at Copthorne Tara Again I liked the fact that I could buy a baguett in reception as I m not a big eater in the morning

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: I was given an upgrade which I much appreciated My room was excellent on the 12th floor It was large and well appointed The staff were courteous and friendly a big improvement on my last stay

Negative_Review: Nothing at all

Negative_Review: Difficulty with checking in and quite frankly a receptionist that hardly spoke English Also we booked a double room but ended up with a twin

Positive_Review: Cleanliness of bedding and towels all fresh and soft Ease of check in and out

Negative_Review: the railway noise was constant day and night so that was annoying At breakfast they were so keen to clear the tables that you still had food in your mouth as the plates and cutlery were being cleared away you just felt rushed

Positive_Review: Convenience cleanliness and comfort combined with friendly and helpful staff Our second stay here and it won t be our last
