Negative_Review: The furniture and facilities in the room were slightly dated We stayed in a twin room the bed however was comfortable

Negative_Review: The hotel is next to the tube So perhaps the lower levels might be bothered by the noise
Positive_Review: After difficult trip and late arrival a very friendly receptionist told me that I would be upgraded to a 12th floor room which was spacious by U S standards clean with a lovely view The breakfast supplemental cost with most rooms was good as far as buffets go especially since espresso is available Full breakfast available at additional charge I wound up eating in the two restaurants and enjoyed my selections at both Again good for hotel food Around the corner from the Circle Line tube so very convenient

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We had a little issue with our room at first but once reception was notified they handled it brilliantly The staff were attentive and very good View of London from the room was great Really pleasant stay

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Good Location Short walk through walkway at the side of the hotel brings you right to Kensington Station and various shops coffee shops etc Nice sized hotel room Spent one night at this hotel when I joined my husband who had arrived a couple of days earlier with a group to watch a World Cup Game His group stayed at the hotel right next door and we were quoted 179 for a double room excluding breakfast Paid 105 at Copthorne Tar and that included breakfast Our room at CT was double the size of the hotel room in the hotel next door Lovely friendly helpful staff all in all a great hotel Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay there again

Negative_Review: When we first came we were so disappointed the house from outside looks hideous But the reception much better though Had to upgrade the room to club because the superior room was really bad a 120 cm bed for to persons ac not working and railway just outside The new room wasn t that much better except for the view and the access to club lounge Very old decoration and condition especially the bathroom No free wifi Small English breakfast lacking taste Good fruits and pastry Very nice staff in club lounge Location good nearest tube High Street Kensington I m not booking this hotel again
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Bed size in superior double was a tad small The hotel exterior is in dire need of a refurb but inside it more than makes up for it You turn up and think oh but get inside and go mmm

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: A value for money weekend stay staff very friendly and most helpful Situated In an ideal position for the things we wanted to see Would highly recommend this hotel

Positive_Review: Cleanliness and good facilities

Negative_Review: Leaving it

Positive_Review: Tight security in guest access to rooms It s within easy access to Kensington High StreetTube Sation using a short cut route Near to shopping street A beautiful old church with a serene compound just behind the high street opposite the tube station was a pleasent discovery Breakfast spread was good cut fruits were fresh and good variety

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: i really appreciate the performance of Staff especially Marcus whom position is concierge All of them are really kind and very willing to help customer The location of hotel is good Just take 5 mins from the station of underground by walk Moreover the manger of restaurant can speak Cantonese is a big plus

Negative_Review: Not a good locaci hr the hotel area is kind of run down and dirty We understand that is a Historical location the hotel is nice but still scary to walk around at all Hotel could use more English speaking personnel as well as dinner waitresses The waitressses round around alto and is hard to get their attention it took 3 requests to just add the dinner TAP to the Room and more than 1 2 hr Nice breakfast buffet
Positive_Review: E stayed h roe to be hable to visita Pompaii

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Easy to find parking was good food was good rooms were clean and neat would go back again very reasonable prices on rooms happy all round with this hotel

Negative_Review: The furniture of the lobby is old and the bed is not too much soft
Positive_Review: I liked the cooperation of the staff and the cleanliness of the hotel and the breakfast

Negative_Review: We couldn t get the wifi to work despite ringing reception several times for an access code
Positive_Review: The hotel was well placed for access to the Royal Albert Hall It has onsite car parking The room was comfortable with the essential tea coffee making facilities Breakfast buffet was good

Negative_Review: For over 150 for 1 night we were dissaponited that Wi Fi had to be paid for This is free at bed and breakfasts coffee shops and supermarkets This is archaic and greedy The furniture was tired there was freeview channels not available like itv4 These aspects are so behind the times and impacted the entertainment whilst in the room Staff were either going through the motions or extremely helpful and nothing in between The bed was very small for two adults and rolled inwards from edges and an electric plug socket was actually sitting away from the wall and loose Language barriers with staff also
Positive_Review: Location was good Quick book in

Negative_Review: Paying 10 per day for wifi Becomes even more expensive as its 10 per device so would be expensive for a couple ot family to stay My next hotel the following day has no charge for wifi
Positive_Review: A good sized room and facilities

Negative_Review: Breakfast was the same every morning Could offer waffles pancakes and a different bacon
Positive_Review: The gentleman at the conceierge desk was excellent with knowledge and getting our lost luggage and helpful at every turn Thank you

Negative_Review: We had a clogged sink that took should have taken 5 minutes to resolve instead took advising 3 different staff members and more than 15 hours to fix We had higher expectations for the price point and were disappointed
Positive_Review: Great location Close and convenient to access lots of spots in London

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The staff were very helpful and pleasant the room was well appointed and there was everything we needed We did have a problem contacting room service but when we eventually got through the service and food were very good

Negative_Review: The increased car parking charges To be honest we have now thought of paying a little extra for parking and staying more central as upon balance costs of travel to the west end from Kensington would even this out Can you do something about this

Negative_Review: The hotel was a little dated and needs some upgrading Rooms OK but expected better based on 4 star rating

Negative_Review: Very poor breakfast didn t bother on our second morning as we were so disappointed Room a little tired for a Superior room No real Ales served in the bar
Positive_Review: Great location for Hyde Park Kensington palace and the Natural History Museum Nice and quiet off the high street Easy to find from Kensington High street tube station

Negative_Review: I booked through booking com and had the confirmation saying the payment would be taken at the hotel Booking com actually took this a few days in advance which was really frustrating as this was from a personal account t when I had my work credit card to pay at the hotel itself I spent about an hour on hold to try and get through as well telephone num provided on the website very aggravating
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: Some Staff in the club breakfast room were poorly trained I asked for a pot of tea as the first one poured direct had a strange taste and the waiter asked if it was ok to use the same cup My partner asked for the fruit as bowls were empty and it took 15 20 minutes at which point we had finished breakfast Ordered bottle of wine AT the bar which was vastly over priced 39 and extra 3 service charge automatically put on bill was taken off when I pointed out I had served myself
Positive_Review: Fab location and the club rooms are v spacious by London standards Had a 12th floor room which was quiet and one of the few hotels I have stayed in were I didn t need to ask for more toiletries which were fully restocked each of the 3 days of my stay

Negative_Review: Having booked with you on several occasions on arrival although it was before check in I enquired details of room and found they had to find room matching our requirements which I feel that as we had booked with this hotel really early they mustn t have taken details down At first it was suggested that we could have a similar accomodation but with adjoining room I did not want this but the receptionist who was very helpful found a suitable room which was fine I would hope that in future if staying here again that they would consider guest s requirements more As far as booking com is concerned we have always been more than happy with your service
Positive_Review: Staff were very good Even at breakfast times having to cope with large numbers of guests were unfazed and courteous making it a pleasant experience stress free

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The beds were excellent Room compact but with excellent city view from the high floor Reception staff very cooperative and close to public transportation

Negative_Review: The receptionist was rude The food at breakfast was not good quality and not hot

Negative_Review: check in took 20 mins ordered double room it had been made upa s a twin it took 5 misn to get reception to answer my call they did correct this

Negative_Review: arrived allocated a room was not ready had to be allocated another one staff were not very friendly the cleanliness of room was not up to scratch

Negative_Review: When we arrived they said they didn t have a double room even though that s what we had booked and paid for approx 3 weeks prev we had to wait till a room was ready by this time it 17 45 and check in time was 2 pm although we arrived about 17 20 they offered us s cocktail which was so strong it was undrinkable We eventually got a room about 18 45 and after complaint to manager he gave us a bottle of wine and complimentary breakfast

Positive_Review: Everything we needed was within the hotel Loved the hustle and bustle of the reception area ground floor Then we were able to go to a lovely quiet room

Negative_Review: there was nothing not to like all good

Negative_Review: Reception staff were a bit surly hotel was very tired looking top class rooms were adequate but not top class lots of chavs

Negative_Review: A little frayed at the edges
Positive_Review: Well connected 2 minutes from Kensington high street underground Decent size of room comfortable bed lots of closet drawer space Free WiFi worked well

Positive_Review: Comfortable clean well positioned to access London sights and places of interest

Negative_Review: Even though we had an upgrade to a club room and access to club facilities the wi fi connection was poor to non existant breakfast in the club room offered less choice than the standard room We ordered fried eggs as an alternative to the scrambled eggs on offer and would still be there now if we had waited for them I would never pay for a club room upgrade having experienced both options
Positive_Review: Comfortable hotel great location for visiting central London car parking at 25 per day a great facility

Negative_Review: The bathroom needs to be updated and the bed pillows and linen are a bit over used
Positive_Review: I love the location staff are very nice breakfast is good and got free wifi Over all a good experience and surly will stay here again

Negative_Review: Waiting at reception to check in There was one member of staff for ordinary guests while the other assistant sat doing nothing at the desk for Club guests although there were none waiting to check in
Positive_Review: Large rooms clean

Negative_Review: Check in was a faff and took ages and at check out we just left the keys in the box as the staff were taking forever to deal with just two parties Noise in corridor Mezzanine floor and from air con Price demanded for wifi 10 pd a rip off Pretentiously discouraged from ordering drinks at the bar waiter service only and then regularly waiting 10 mins if the staff hadn t forgotten the order to receive our drinks even when the bar nearly empty The service was not commensurate with the premium drinks prices
Positive_Review: Price 100 pn in view of location The foyer shops and other public areas are quite smart and stylish In view of the price the room was furnished and equipped like an Ibis or Travelodge but with lots of gilt fittings to make it look upmarket

Negative_Review: I paid for WiFi but the service was lousy I lost count of the number of times I had to have the password reset
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent unfailingly polite and helpful

Negative_Review: We had a small problem on arrival as the kettle in our room wasn t working I traced the wire back behind the large piece of furniture on which the kettle stood to find it was turned off at the socket so had to move the drawers luggage stand very heavy away from wall to switch on My husband is blind and he could not have resolved this had he been on his own Our second night was slightly spoiled by excessive noise from people in next room so slightly better soundproofing would help We both found the bed a little too firm for our taste These are 3 minor problems though
Positive_Review: Warm reception Excellent facilities Good breakfast Easy checkout Altogether excellent We were attending the Proms so the hotel was very conveniently placed for us All round a very good experience and would book again

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: 2 females aged 70 and we felt safe in the area even when we were walking to the V A for a midnight exhibition The staff were willing and friendly

Negative_Review: The only thing I could say was there was not enough outlets by the bed Otherwise everything was great

Negative_Review: There was an error with the booking but it was eventually resolved satisfactorily Do not think breakfast was very good value for the price
Positive_Review: comfortable room and generally a good location for our purpose

Negative_Review: Lift system Security measures prevented me from getting to the higher floor where rest of family group were Could not access stairs On the morning of departure before we had checked out my keycard had been cancelled so I could not use the lift nor open my room door
Positive_Review: Staff always polite helpful

Negative_Review: The coffee at breakfast was not very nice but it was included in the upgrade so can t really complain
Positive_Review: We were upgraded to a Club room that included free breakfast The room 11th floor had a terrific view across London and the hotel is in a fantastic location Excellent value for money

Negative_Review: The bathroom need renovation and pillows are not my type
Positive_Review: The location is excellent very close to High Street Kensington Hyde Park and central for other areas Staff are very helpful and courteous

Negative_Review: We thought the breakfast left a lot to be desired the usual tired buffet breakfast experience Overdone scrambled eggs cardboard sausages tasteless bacon Would have preferred freshly fried eggs which were not obviously available
Positive_Review: Booked a club room and was very satisfied with the room comfort etc

Negative_Review: Having to pay for WiFi We were travelling for over a month and stayed at 6 different accommodations in the UK this was the only place we had to pay for WiFi Also receiving an email on the day we were leaving NZ telling us to update our credit card details or our accommodation may be cancelled We did not receive an email like that from any other source
Positive_Review: The breakfasts were very good

Negative_Review: Had to pay for wifi Considering we travelled Scotland and England and did not have to pay for any other wifi we were very shocked Just went to local pubs and cafes for Internet
Positive_Review: No Positive

Negative_Review: The service was sloppy Definitely not a 4 star In my opinion it s barely a 3 star On arrival my partner and I were expected to take our own 5large suitcases to our room ourself No porter service was offered I requested house keeping to bring cotton buds on numerous occasions needless to say I am still waiting And the overall service of house keeping was not acceptable We left a carrier bag of trash next to the full bin And it was left there for two days They literally made the bed and brought towels They didn t replenish the teabags or cotton pads Nor did they bring them on request The most disappointing experience was breakfast where I found a piece of bright blue plastic in my omelette The dish was taken away but no apology was made The waiter just brought a new omelette without communcating with us and more importantly without an apology
Positive_Review: The only thing that was like able about the stay was the location of the hotel

Negative_Review: We only had one adverse comment The panels for the over the bath shower were in need of attention
Positive_Review: We always stay at the Copthorne Tara The service is always first class the rooms and the beds are comfortable The tube is near for getting around London

Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Excellent location for West London Tube within 5 minutes We were upgraded to a club room which meant we could use the Club Lounge with free drinks and snacks

Negative_Review: Arrived early but the receptionist wouldn t even check on the system to see if a room was free we understand the hotel is busy but were surprised that she refused even to check The concierge wouldn t less us stop in front of the hotel for just a minute to put bags because a VIP was about to arrive The VIP was just another family doing exactly what we wanted to do perhaps they had pre tipped better Overall we have stayed many times and will do again as the hotel is usually great but we suspect the hotel management has recently changed and this has has a detrimental effect on how customers are treated Hopefully this will be addressed as it s a great hotel
Positive_Review: Great location Good breakfast Fast lifts Good parking

Negative_Review: a bit old fashioned furniture and decor view from the window railway track the same choice for breakfast every day
Positive_Review: Friendly and helpful staff fast elevator convenient location

Negative_Review: Room was a little tired and could do with a refresh as could the hotel in general The bar was very large and very expensive paying extra for drinks is expected in London but there is a limit
Positive_Review: Location is very good and the staff were very helpful Good car parking facilities and at a reasonable price

Negative_Review: On arrival we were told breakfast was not included despite my showing my Booking com receipt So were our friends who had travelled from a different city Receptionist then said she would have to call supervisor but she could not get through and kept us standing at the desk I said she should give us our room and sort out the breakfast and leave us a message that this would be good management She did this the message came that breakfast was indeed paid for The same for our friends Poor Poor She had us standing there and I had to take the lead to get the situation moved on Wifi should be free for those of us one nighters we were going to the Grime Prom We wouldn t use much but picking up e mails would have been good No safe in the room Food was terrible in the Brasserie Why is the price so variable Our friends and us paid different amounts We won t stay there again
Positive_Review: The Staff are really polite and helpful

Negative_Review: The rooms are a little outdated but comfortable enough The breakfast was quite basic for the price
Positive_Review: The hotel is in a great location 2 minutes from High Street Kensington tube station The staff were very friendly and it has a nice atmosphere in general

Negative_Review: the furniture was a bit on the old side but did not spoil anything

Negative_Review: Drinks in the bar were pricy but that is London You sertainly thing twice about another round
Positive_Review: frendly staff very helpful room was good size and clean hotel in good location to see sites

Negative_Review: Room a little tired broken drawer electric socket not working Dried blood on toilet basin

Negative_Review: ask for two rooms adjoining or at least near by couldnt of been further apart on same floor managed to get moved room wasnt serviced one first day till we asked didnt take away dirty plates no tea or milk next day asked for more next day not delivierd bed and pillows very uncomfortable rooms very tired need completely not just a lick of paint as what was happening during our visit
Positive_Review: entrance stairs up to function suites

Negative_Review: Service is poor bed sheet they don t change it daily I brought a pizza asked them to heat up they refused even that simple thing they do not do it I stayed at the hotel twice I never heard from the welcome back when I checked out they only give one hour from one room out of 3 room and they said they would charged if I stay longer in summary I do not see them

Negative_Review: No Negative
